They voluntarily offered to serve us Halal meat upon learning we were Muslim, communicated with airline staff on our behalf when our luggage was delayed, and took us to the superstore outside shuttle hours when we were hungry. Loved it.Room: We stayed in the Jepun Suite which was very large and spacious. For us, the layout made it so that we barely used the lounge so in retrospect, we might have chosen a simpler and cheaper room. Everything was comfortable and clean. Only downside of the open-style construction is that there were bugs and geckos in the room. The mosquito net around the bed meant that the bugs weren't disturbing us but the geckos were noisy and we were a bit weirded out at times.Food: Simple but fresh and great breakfast everyday. They typically have you choose the night before and prepare it for you in the morning. We were served breakfast in the villa once at our request too.Others: Nice pool with warm water. Staff helped us plan for and reserve activities (specifically White Water Rafting and the Mt. Batur trek) at reasonable prices.At checkout they were ind enough to accept dollars as well at a fair exchange rate. The only negative was that they tried to overcharge for our airport pickup at checkout but were nice and friendly when we insisted on paying only the agreed-upon amount.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My sister and I stayed in Kano Sari Ubud Villas in November 2018 and it was fabulous!I cannot emphasize enough how friendly and hospitable everyone there was. It felt like they had all the details figured out and made our stay extremely comfortable and convenient. Some examples of this include:- They helped us plan a custom tour around some of the sights we most wanted to see, including then arranging the driver for us for the day.- They provided a small local cell phone so we could call for rides home (which was super handy)- They provided ear plugs (needed because despite being away from the city noise, there were some roosters living nearby who woke up with the sunrise…) and sarongs for visiting temples- They had super colorful and tasty a la carte breakfast options that changed each morning- They also had a book with local recommendations which we used with great success, and helped us with dinner reservations each night to make sure we got good seats Overall exceptional stay!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Kano Sari is ideally place, a short walk and you are on the main street of Ubud. Close to all the restaurants, shops, bars and not so far from the monkey sancuray.The rooms are clean and very comfortable. If you are using the hotel shuttle service be sure to give plenty of notice. Loved sitting on the balcony listening to the sounds of the forest outside. Wasn't quite as good listening to the cockrel in the morning but ear plugs were complimentary from the hotel.Would happily stay here again.Loved the pool.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Back in Ubud again and couldn’t resist going back to Kano Sari for a re visit and thank goodness we did. Accomodation, food, service and overall hospitality is still first class and it was nice to introduce our teenage children to the Kano family.Yes we will be back again and again !Thanks team Kano Sari
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Simply put, I cannot wait to go back. The entire stay was perfection. The villas are beautiful and immaculate. The service is exceptional and kindness we encountered profound. When you check in, you are escorted to a perfect little abode and given a cell phone. Complimentary car service is provided to downtown Ubud, where you can dine and shop. A quick call confirms pick up location. Breakfast is divine and complimentary (!!!). We ate at the courtyard by the pool every morning, enjoying the view and the sounds of the waterfall.The massages are amazing!! Honestly, there is nothing better than a massage while you hear the rain. The hotel itself is situated in a little street, amid local life. Close to City Center, but just far enough to avoid the hustle and bustle. We loved it so much, we kept extending our stay. One of the highlights of our trip. Cannot wait to come back. Thank you for your hospitality Kano Sari! See you soon!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great position within walking distance of the centre of Ubud, gorgeous, clean rooms, luxurious swimming pool and amazing, outstanding staff!! Host Karen and here wonderful team made us feel more than welcome -they made us feel at home. Can't wait to do a return visit!!!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had the great pleasure staying at Kano Sari recently. It was an amazing stay! Everything was awesome - accommodation, gardens/grounds, pool, food and their best asset the staff!! I would have no hesitation in recommending this fantastic villa in magical Ubud. I enjoyed the time spent here with my friends. The only problem was actually having to leave! I’ll be back!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Quiet hideaway in hectic Ubud. Beautiful garden and tastefully designed rooms. Staff read from your lips. Walking distance to market and museums. Breakfast and Daykitchen delicious and creative. Alltogether: highly recommendable.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are just home from our wonderful stay in Kano Sari Ubud . The ambiance of this villa is fabulous. The open plan has interesting paths and stairs that lead to a stunning pool and outdoor dinning area.every little nook and cranny has an amazing view or relaxed chill out vibe going on . You will not be disappointed if you stay in this amazing home . Karen and her staff ( all of them ) make sure you are more than welcome happy well fed and shuttled around Ubud as needed . After dinning out we fancied some black coconut rice dessert ( on the menu at KS ) . So we phoned them ,someone was there to pick us up and our dessert was waiting for us on the table upon our return . A1 service . We seriously did not want to leave . If our families weren’t waiting for us back home we all could have stayed longer . We will be back .
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is hands down our favourite place in Ubud. No, in Bali. Just finished our second visit, with a big smile. Not much luxury-fuzz here. No private pool, no fancy restaurant and not much of a view, either. It´s small and intimate, it´s CLEAN, it has a great layout and it makes you feel like home. The latter is on the account of two things: 1. The calm, airy and relaxing common area. Stepping in the main entrance is like entering an oasis, with an open living room seamlessly connecting with a lush garden and pool area. 2. The lovely staff. Coming here makes you feel like visiting friends, even if it´s coming back from a trip in the afternoon or returning for a new visit the year after the last one. Rooms are basic. But hey, who needs more than basic when there is a good size room, fridge minibar, aircon and good size bathroom. All of them with spotless cleanliness. One of the great features at Kano Sari is a place for massage and yoga. Plenty of space, an open and airy but still shaded space with next to no view into it from the common area or rooms. Brilliant architecture!There´s no fancy restaurant at Kano Sari. Still, guest have tasty food available all day.Kano Sari is 10-15 mins walk from the Jl Raya Ubud main street. Its within walking distance from most things in Ubud, depending on how you define walking distance. Since our last visit, owner Karen has established a free shuttle service for guests within Ubud center (limited by Monkey Forest and Ubud Palace). Great!Suggestions for improvements: Beds are getting somewhat worn, mattresses will hopefully be replaced in a not too distant future.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms have all been personally styled Each one is different. Very relaxing, the food is delicious and the wine is very good.The gardens are very pretty,overall amazing. If you are looking for a relaxing holiday do yourself a favour and book you and your friends in.Novi the manager and her team treat organise everything for you from food to transport,shopping trips and adventures.Have a massage over looking to beautiful gardens.Highly recommended
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely to have a place like this to come back to in the middle of Ubud. So clean and quiet with superb service from the staff. Having the bed turned down at night and plugging in the mosquito repellent was a lovely touch. I really enjoyed being treated like royalty. The staff recommendations were spot on as we did a cooking course, ayurvedic massage and saw a reggae band at LOL bar. I would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thank you Kano Sari for making our honeymoon so lovely!I would 100% recommended this place to everyone visiting Bali, after a long trip from England the staff were so welcoming and very attentive.The location is brilliant and Kano Sari has a driver that can take you places for a very reasonable price.Our room was lovely, clean and spacious.Thank you again.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There's not many places that get a fantastic review from me, I'm a bit picky. I have travelled a lot in my life.... A lot.This place is just amazing, and what really makes it is the extra touches and effort gone to by the staff.On our day of arrival I had decided that I would propose should there be somewhere suitable. Of course there was. After I told the staff my plan they went out and got flowers and decorated the rotunda for me to surprise my partner. It was magical.The funny thing was that prior to me proposing, my partner actually mused to me that this would be a good place for a wedding. So yes, we're going to get married here too!!All the staff are fabulous, special mention to Novi. They even figured out my birthday from the passport. The included breakfast is much more than a hotel buffet and the choices vary each day. They can accommodate any variation too.Lots of room combinations so if you have a child or family, pick the room that suits. There are a total of 6 villas in the property. There is a common lounge area where breakfast can be taken if you don't like the area by the pool. A phone is included to take with you to call for pick up when you are out and about. Lots of other amazing things that I won't spoil.Yes there are some midges and mosquitoes but this is Bali you can't blame anyone for that. They include earplugs, we heard some interesting animals at night and there's one rooster in particular whose clock is a bit off and starts up at 0330!Love that they consider the environment and don't have disposable bottles but instead use refillable ones.Can't wait to go back!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a stunning find and hands-down the best place we stayed in Bali! The staff were sooo unbelievably helpful - they couldn't do enough for us! They organised tours and activities, and offered local knowledge on a wide range of things. The villa is so beautiful and every part was thoughtfully constructed together. It is a short walk into the center of town (10-15 mins) but they offer a free drop and pick up service. We loved the beautiful room, the view from the balcony into (what felt like) the jungle, the breakfasts served poolside, and the chilled atmosphere of the place. Despite its great location, it was perfectly peaceful at night. The perfect place to stay to appreciate all that Ubud has to offer. Only wish we could've stayed longer.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a beautiful location with beautiful staff and great service. Appreciated the free courier service for around Ubud or great local drivers when on a sight seeing trip. Kadek was a great driver with detailed information to add to the experience. Thank you Novi and great staff at the Kano Sari.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Kano Sari, could be....should be my second home. Had a friend with us this trip to Bali and had to take her to this 'haven in busy Ubud' Only a short stay this time, no availability for a longer stay unfortunately.Kano Sari has captured just what you need to rejuvenate your body and soul. Set in exquisite tropical gardens it is just a delight. The Villas are charming, clean fresh and tastefully decorated.The staff never disappoint, friendly, attentive and polite, nothing is a problem for them.Brekkys are amazing, great choice and flexibility, freshly cooked when you want it.'Any time' drop and pickup into town is a great service.Just love Kano Sari, see you again soon
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An amazing villa tucked away in the heart of Ubud. We felt right at home the instance we stalled foot into KanoSari. The staff were amazing, making sure we were looked after everyday. A must go to when staying in Ubud.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Kano Sari Villa's are absolutely divine. Our experience from check in to check out was flawless and as other reviews have mentioned, the staff are incredible. Firstly, they arranged pick up and transport from the airport direct to the hotel for a very reasonable price. On arrival, we were greeted by Novi (she's absolutely lovely!), with welcome drinks in hand (Delicious!) and were given the tour of the villa. We stayed in the "main house" second floor Capung suit. It was stunning, overlooking the pool and gardens. Everything was spotless, the bathroom was beautiful and the bed was one of the most comfortable we've had in Bali. Every morning our breakfast was made fresh to order at a requested time, and selected the night prior from a very comprehensive menu. The juices are delicious as well! We did not eat any other meals in the resort (so many restaurants in Ubud), but based on breakfast would recommend this if suited. The staff at Kano Sari make the experience here worth every penny. You will not get a better experience in Ubud for the price... Don't look any further :)
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well once again we returned to the place we have felt was our second home. This was our third visit to Kano Sari, and our return was like being met by our family members. We were picked up by our driver and friend, and taken to our villa. On arrival we were met by old and new staff members and with such a warm welcome was the start of a fantastic time spent at Ubud. Each time Kano Sari has undergone beautiful and colourful decor changes thanks to the wonderful host Karen. Her beautiful staff are always there to help, cook, and make every holiday wish you would like to have come true. Nothing is too much trouble for anyone of them, and questions, hints or ideas for a great holiday are readily available.This time we stayed in Taman, a gorgeous suite, with its own Semi outdoor bathroom, which is one of the most amazing bathrooms I have experienced. The suite is only a few steps to the pool area or the main house. The entire villa is literally a gardeners paradise. Every which way you look there are nooks and crannies of plants and flowers and secret sections of the garden to explore We thoroughly enjoyed our trip yet again, and got to have new experiences thanks to all the staff, drivers and the wonderful Karen. We will be back, without a doubt.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Kano Sari is in a great location in central Ubud, but tucked away nicely on a side street. The rooms are spacious and clean and the pool area is pleasant and well kept. Breakfast is very good. There are different choices every day and you select your order the night before. The best thing about this place is the staff. They are are brilliant, friendly, always smiling and go out of their way to help their guests. Nothing is too much trouble. My only gripe was that the room we stayed in had walls which didn't go right up to the ceiling, so I'd recommend booking a different room if you value privacy. Despite that, I'd still recommend booking the Kano Sari.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our most recent stay at Kano Sari was our third overall - every time we visit Ubud we've stayed here, and don't even bother researching other places. Kano Sari is relaxed and never over-crowded (there are 5 villas total), so you can always lounge by the pool in peace and quiet. The food is delicious and can be served to you anywhere in Kano Sari (our favourite spot was next to the pool!). The in-house massages that the staff can arrange for you are blissful and extremely well-priced. Most importantly, the staff at Kano Sari are incredibly kind and helpful, I feel so comfortable when staying there that it makes leaving very difficult!When we next visit Ubud, there's no question about where we'll be staying.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stay here.... we were a group of six women, we booked 3 x double rooms and spent 3 nights. We left, reluctantly, planning and hoping to return to this oasis of quiet and serene calm, a relaxing beautiful space, with discrete, patient and attentive staff. Nothing was a problem :)
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about this place is really good. Good and clean room with a very good bed. Location a bit walking from centrum and monkey forest BUT the providing a free shuttle yoy can book anytime. They give you a cell phone which you can use to call reception and shuttle. The guest service was TOP! So friendly, absolute perfection and not fake ir to much friendley. They mean it and want to spoil their guests. We recommend this place to everybody: no doubt, you will love it!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Kano sari is one of those experiences that you don't want to end. We had 7 days in Ubud with the team at Kano Sari. They are incredibly welcoming and make the whole stay in Ubud easy. The food is 10/10, rooms and housekeeping are of the highest standard. If you're tossing up between Kano Sari and another option - stop looking now, you've found the right place.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the place to stay in Ubud and all the great reviews are justified! The 6 rooms are gorgeous with king singles or combined into a huge king. The staff are there to look after your every whim. You get dropped and picked up all around Ubud for free. They organised everything, from dinner bookings to massages - couldn’t be more helpful! The Australian owner was a delight. Happy days and we will be back.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved our stay at Kano Sari. Beautiful and peaceful. Amazing hotel with wonderful service. Nothing is too much trouble for the great staff. We were thoroughly spoilt. The rooms are spacious, comfortable and well appointed. They have thought of everything. Highly recommended.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay in Kano Sari was really nice. The breakfast was good and the staff helpful.Kano Sari is near to Ubud's city centre. It is also possible to rent a scooter for around 4$ per day.We highly recommend it.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Small and friendly hotel. The staff are just wonderful and the hotel rooms are spacious and well appointed. Breakfast menu varies every day and the food was excellent. There are also very good, inexpensive local restaurants nearby. Check out 'Wild Ginger' just down the road for some fantastic local food.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is one of the best Hotels we have stayed in. Only 6 rooms nice and private, very well appointed with a fresh water dispenser in each and beautiful bathrooms. The staff are fantastic and provide a very personal service. Nothing is too hard for them. Free drop offs and pickups around Ubud (though it's only a 15 minute walk to the Ubud market). Delightful breakfasts and dinner if you choose to eat at the hotel. Massages etc. available on site. Just down the same street there are 2 very good restaurants (Lemongrass & Wild Ginger) but you should book as they are very popular.We had a free day room with full access to the Hotel until 6pm on our last day while we waited for our transport to the Airport.Great value for money.This will be our hotel of choice in Bali.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Delighted to say we enjoyed our visit to Kano Sari once again! truly a haven of style peace and Ubud culture. The connection with the authentic scenic environment is charming. The staff are personal caring and professional. Situated close to Ubud town but in a small community village. Excellent value for your money We will be back.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel on the recommendation of a travel acquaintance who stated it was the number one boutique hotel in Ubud. This was totally correct! We arranged for the hotel's driver to pick us up from the airport and he was there to meet us and took care of our transport and hotel checkin with care and expertise. Our room was perfect. The bathroom was beautiful and there was a dressing room with mirror and heaps of wardrobe space, and a clean water dispenser. No need to buy water!The staff were excellent and provided everything we needed including transportation to various restaurants and places of interest in the Ubud area, all part of the unique 5-star service. However the cost was surprisingly low. The pool was divine with good access for a person with bad knees. Because the hotel only caters for approximately 12 guests the pool was never crowded and we usually had it to ourselves. I sincerely recommend this hotel to anyone wanting good quality and spacious rooms sutuated in a restful and peaceful environment.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a beautiful property in the middle of Ubud but is situated so that it feels like an oasis in the middle of the jungle. The villas are spacious and beautifully appointed with super comfortable beds and gorgeous linens. You will be provided with all amenities imaginable from bug spray to free WiFi to temple sarongs and cells for use during your stay. There is literally nothing we needed that hadn't been thought of. The villas include free breakfast with changing menus so you have a wonderful assortment of options all fresh and delicious. The pool is super clean and the perfect temperature.Take advantage of the spa services, Jero is exceptional! Kano Sari also offers driving services provided by Nyoman. He took us for a day trip that included a water blessing and rice fields. We also went to the Bali Pulina coffee plantation which was a great opportunity to sample (and buy!) local coffee to take home. Nyoman speaks excellent English and knows the area like the back of his hand. We quickly learned that one of the most important aspects of visiting Bali is having a good driver. For a nominal daily charge, you significantly enhance your experience here.All the staff are exceptional, friendly, attentive and a wonderful resource to make the most of your time in Ubud. It really feels like you are staying with family. Karen, the owner, Gede, the guest manager, along with Jero and Meri went out of their way to make the experience special. Jero prepared our last meal and it was one of the best we’d had anywhere in Ubud. Stay in at least for one night! She made us a red curry and chicken with mushroom and bacon sauce that was out of this world. I’d put our meals had at the Kaon Sari right up there with the restaurant at The Kayon, rated at the top in Bali. BE SURE TO BOOK THIS PROPERTY, IT IS NOT TO BE MISSED AND A TREMENDOUS VALUE FOR A HIGH END RESORT.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great time at Kano Sari and truly enjoyed the relaxed and calm atmosphere of the place. The staff and the quality of service is exceptional. The Location is laso good and in walking distance to Ubud market and restaurants.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just 4 days at Kano Sari Ubud Villas and I feel 10 YEARS YOUNGER! That's what happens when you stay here. I have never slept better anywhere in the world! The setting for this hotel is fantastic. Only a short walk from Ubud city centre and you in a jungle oasis of peace and serenity. Nothing is too much trouble for the staff at Kano Sari. On arrival, they give you a mobile phone so you can contact them anytime and from anywhere. This is a great feature if you find yourself lost in the back streets of Ubud! The rooms are well appointed and the food is incredible. There is a friendly family atmosphere here. I have stayed in many places in Ubud over the years, but this one is a rare find. I will be back!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place is just pure relaxation. The Staff is super friendly and helped us out wherever it could. The breakfast was delicious and made fresh upon arrival on the entrance hall. The hall was a big get together and like a big dining room at home. You could enjoy your meals nearby the pool or in the entrance hall at a long table, where you can chat with other hotel guests. The rooms are perfect: a huge bed, an even huger bathroom, plenty of room to put your stuff. Since a lot of reviews mentionend the missing wifi inside the rooms: This has been changed, you can now access the wifi everywhere.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at Kano Sari over the Christmas break with my parents. I had the most amazing time there - the room was beautiful, the bed comfortable and huge, and the staff were amazing. Novi and Gede were able to assist me with anything I needed - booking tours and massages, meals, and advising of local tailors, artists and specialty stores. During my stay there was heavy rainfall, but the staff can provide drop offs and pick ups in town, or meal in the room, so it wasn’t an issue at all. Kano Sari is a small, intimate villa that makes you feel at home as soon as you arrive. I can’t wait to book my next trip back!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was one of the best travel experiences in my whole life. It was like staying with relatives in their luxurious villa. Karen, the owner with her impeccable taste, has created a true paradise. Beside everything being so tastefully decorated, it was absolutely spotless and well maintained. Genuine smiles and warmth of the staff (this dry official word "staff" didn't even suit them, as they were much more than that!) We received a mobile phone with a programmed number, so we could contact Kano Sari any time if we got lost or needed to be picked up while walking anywhere in Ubud. Lots of help was given with all our activities: information, suggestions, reservations. Driving from and to the airport was also organized by Kano Sari. I am sure we will miss those magnificent breakfasts with a touch of the girls' love added to them. This was a holiday in heaven!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was the best accommodation which I ever had in my holidays! Everything was great, above all expectations. Very helpful and genuinely friendly staff, amazingly presented and very tasty food, very comfortable bed in superb designed bedroom and balcony with a million dollars view. Decoration and artworks are amazing, garden and swimming pool unbelievably beautiful. Kano Sari it's a real piece of germ which created with great taste and love. Thank you, Kerry, Novi, G'day and other people of the team. We will be back.Julia. 24/01/3018
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Magnificent hotel near downtown. They really help you to get an awesome experience in Ubud, from reservations to drive you to the airport. I'll definitely will be back. The breakfast is very good, and it is included!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a magical week at Kano Sari, a whole of villa booking and it was just perfect.This wonderful oasis within a tropical, inviting garden with stunning orchids. Butterflies, dragonflies and birds amidst the flowers and frangipani trees. I've stayed at Kano Sari a few times already and loved it so much that I wanted to bring my family back. The whole family thought Kano Sari was surberb, all villas were equally impressive, each decorated with local woods, colourful cushions and local artwork. Oh and the beds are great. The rooms are spotlessly clean and have a daily housekeeping as well as turnover service. As usual the Kano Sari staff headed by Novi, weaved their magic. Nothing is ever a problem, she excels in attentiveness and efficiency. A true gem! Thank you Novi!Gede as always is always keen to help.The kitchen staff as well were always super sweet and accommodating with all our big family group. And the house keepers are courteous and helpful and the rooms reflect this. They all loved our grandchildren from the oldest to our youngest was a huge hit.Amongst the beauty of the rice terraces and waterfall be sure to include a water blessing. We did this with our family it was a very special, unique and spiritual experience.Looking for somewhere special for a family holiday please think about a whole of villa booking because within 24 hours you are part of the Kano Sari Family.A huge thank you to the owners Karen and Noel for creating such a dream.I'll be back soon!
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 7 Nights in Kano Sari, in Jupun. Just amazing, the room was sensational, the bed just magical. The bathroom spacious and luxe! The bath, just spectacular. The grounds are just amazing and the pool wonderful. The staff were so lovely and just made you feel like you were there with an amazing family. Novie in particular was just so welcoming and lovely. Daily breakfast jaws just wow and the team so accomodating, we did not have a breakfast that we didn’t love. Excellent recommendations on drivers, things to do and other restaurants to visit. We will be back there for sure.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the Jepun villa. That was the biggest villa in the hotel and its awesome. the service was wonderful. the breakfast and food was good. they have a car to drop you at main street or else you can walk down from street which will take 20 mins approx.
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our first visit to Bali startet in Ubud and at Kano Sari. I cant see how it could have started any better. Owner/manager Karen wasn´t present during our visit. But Gede, Novi and the rest of the staff at Kano Sari made us feel genuinely welcome. Cleanliness was spotless in the room, pool and common areas. Breakfast with multiple choices (booked the night before) served at long table in main building, by the pool or i the room. All breakfast options delicious. Snacks and well tasting light meals are served upon request throughout the day. The staff also made nice recommendations for dining out, and even assisted in ordering food deliveries from other restaurants in Ubud. Kano Sari is situated in a small street, some 15 minutes walk from the centre of Ubud. Nice, quiet area. Just prepare to be awakened by the neighbour´s rooster. The room (Sungai suite) is the lowest situated room at Kano Sari. It´s spacious, with aircondition and a king size bed with mosquito net. The mosquito net is there for a reason. Spacious bathroom, partly open towards the woods and the river below. Shelves in the bathroom for keeping clothes and luggage, but we´d wished for a cupboard in the room to keep the luggage out of the damp bathroom. Not a big problem, though. We´d also wished for at little more seating arrangment in the room, and/or on the porch outside. A couple of chairs and a table on the porch outside the room would make a perfect private breakfast spot. During our stay we had 3-4 private yoga sessions with Wira Arimbawa. He´s a highly skilled and equally highly patient yoga teacher the staff at Kano Sari booked upon our wish for private sessions.  Likes: StaffBreakfastCleanlinessSuggestion for improvements: Seating in roomBetter wifi coverage and bandwith
hotelName:
20    Kano Sari Ubud Villas
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recommend the Kayon Resort to everyone! It’s so cozy and every corner here is so beautiful! And the staff is so friendly, helpful and so professional! We have treveles to many countries and have visit a lot of places but we have never meet the staff like here, we were just so impressed because of all the details they've paid attention to! We also got so many compliments from this hotel for our honeymoon! And there is so many options we can use! We also had a chance to visit the Kayon Jungle Resort which is just breathtaking beautiful too!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Kayon Boutique Resort during the first leg of our Honeymoon and can say without a doubt that it is one of the most memorable vacations we have taken. The resort is beautifully integrated into the surrounding nature of Ubud and the staff are always on hand with a smile on their face to cater to your every need. Thank you Kayon for an unforgettable stay.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed 6 nights at the Kayon and just loved the resort. The staff and service were impeccable! They made me feel so welcome and stay very special. I booked the River Suite and was not disappointed. It was beautiful! The resort is very quiet and relaxing. They have a shuttle that can take you to the town center every hour which is a short 10-15 minute ride (depending on traffic). You can also utilize the pool at their sister resort- The Kayon Jungle. The hotel arranged for the shuttle to take me over there one afternoon and that was fabulous as well. I would definitely stay at this resort again when I return to Bali!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely no regrets during our two nights here. Food from Kepitu Restraunt is spotless! room condition and staff are beyond what you could expect. They do have very clean and nice shuttle going into downtown Ubud from morning to late at night so location doesnt bother you at all. If you desire quite and private vacation in Ubud this is it!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The first words that manager Gede spoke to us as we first arrived to the resort were "welcome to our home" and this place surely felt like home and more.Everything from the facilities to the rooms to the staff were excellent, and don't let me start about the customer service, everyone makes you feel like a king as they spoil you with their great service. The restaurant was top notch with the best food that i have ever ate. The pool although small but never crowded had a great view that makes you feel that you are in a tropical paradise. The rooms were very spacious and we had a great view at the river. Room service clean two times a day but they forgot to clean the coffee pot for 2 straight days but that wasn't a bother to us because the rest of the room was spotless. I definitely recommend this resort to anyone staying in ubud. Surely will come again on our next trip to bali. Lastly a special thanks to Mira, Kadek, and Diwa for their great service.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was the third time we have stayed at the Kayon Resort and the third time we have stayed in one of their River Edge Pool Villas. We were there for my 60th birthday and everything went well, including the surprising, staff’s cake presentation at the end of our meal - so sweet! The staff as always are so friendly, knowledgeable, and go out of their way to help you in any way they can. This place is highly recommended to anybody that wants to get away from everything and have a relaxing holiday!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had the river edge villa which was absolutely beautiful, the scenery and nature of the jungle was phenominal. The resort is close to the ubud market where there is a lot of different things to experience and do. The staff are ever so lovely and welcoming and made sure our stay was one of the best for our honeymoon.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: By far the most luxurious resort I have ever stayed at. Stunning accommodation and staff that exceed expectations. They go out of their way to make sure you have an amazing time. The breakfast and high tea are complimentary and exceptional. I recommend taking the free shuttle to explore ubud and going on the morning walk to see the local farms. The morning yoga is great too- and complimentary!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for a couple of nights, first impression "peaceful and calming". Staff were friendly and professional, attentive at all times. Our room had an amazing view of the river and waterfall, it was clean and the bathroom had the view of the forest. The canyon jetty was a great place to unwind with the complimentary high tea with the sound of the waterfall in the background. The food was lovely and well presented. We went on the complimentary village walk in the morning very informative and also used their complimentary shuttle into town. Overall our stay was fantastic highly recommend this place. A very quiet and relaxing stay. We will return.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Balinese people are very hospitable, but this resort have the most hospitable people in Bali. They started us of with a very warm welcome that made us feel at home. Their welcome drink is my favorite (unfortunately, I forgot the name)! They gave us a nice tour around the resort. They showed us to our room (which was given to us a little earlier than the check in time with no extra charge). In our room, they told us the complimentary services that they have during our stay. This resort might be one of the most expensive resorts in Bali, but their comps and services are definitely worth it. The hotel provides a van that comes to the city center almost every hour. The city center is approx 15-20 mins car ride from the resort. The resort provided us with a map (Monkey forest is walking distance from the drop off area!!!) and tips on how to go to different tourist places in Ubud.The rooms are very clean. The resort is in the middle of a forest, right next to a river. There a mosquitoes around the area, but we were unbothered by them. They provide mosquito repellants to their guests. Quick tip: DO NOT BRING MOSQUITO REPELLANTS FROM USA. The mosquitoes are unfazed by those repellants. Use the ones in Indonesia or from another Southeast Asian country. Anyway, the resort does a smoking thing twice a day so the mosquitoes stay away. My favorite part of our room is the bathroom! The bathtub overlooks the river and it is definitely amazing. You can have an instagramable picture of yourself with flowers (which is complimentary, but you have to reserve 1 day before) or with bubbles (which is provided next to your tub with the shampoo). The flower set up takes some time since the workers are very meticulous on designing it. Make sure to leave a tip to these young men who sets up the room and cleans it. They do their job very well without expecting for tips (they were very surprised when we gave them one).During the welcome, we met the restaurant manager who introduced us to their food and different activities around the restaurant. We bought the special dinner for two and we do not regret it! The food is amazing. My husband is a very picky food eater, but he loves the food in this restaurant. (Example: Lamb chops is one of those hit or miss dishes. But this restaurant perfected it.)Their breakfast menu (which is included in the nightly price) provides a variety of flavor depending on your taste. They do not only have American breakfast, but they also introduce Balinese/ Indonesian breakfast. They also have complimentary afternoon tea/ coffee. They have a variety of tea selections that definitely complements the little pastries that come with it. They are also very flexible. One night, my husband was craving for fried chicken (of all dishes!). It is not part of their menu, but we asked the server if the cook can make this possible. They were very fast to tell us that they are able to make this request (which made my hubs very happy). Overall, their restaurant made our trip to Ubud an unforgettable one. We definitely recommend couples who are married, not married or rekindling their love to come and visit this very serene place. Even if you do not go out the resort, there are plenty of things that guests can do. Our trip to Ubud is for rest and relaxation and that is what we had. Young or old, this resort will make you feel at home. Thank you, Kayon. We are very grateful for your services and hospitality.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place for stay. You can see the great view from room, including river, waterfall and high green trees. Such a nice view here. We had a special barbecue dinner and the dishes tasted quite well! All the staff are professional and kind. Highly recommend!!!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoy staying there. Best view from bathroom to the jungle also very clean rooms. Awesome breakfast experience and pool view. They can drop you to the Kayon Jungle Resort which has amazing Infinity Pool
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place is wonderful and magic! It is quiet and peaceful.The staff is absolutely good and high trained so is Gede the resort manager who helped us to take pictures in Balinese dress!!!really it was all perfect we recommend this place.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is an amazing hotel. I chose it for our honeymoon. The staff was amazing, the room was clean and comfortable, nicely decorated. We had 1 hour massage, it was very relaxing. In overall we was deeply impressed.If you are looking for a high class romantic hotel do not hesitate choosing The Kayon Resort.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Came here for 4 days during our bali honeymoon and it did not disappoint! ubud was a wonderful area a and the kayon resort was top notch! We only had one meal there since we were busy exploring the town but it was delicious! We loved the shuttle to town. Was super easy. Everyone at the resort was very kind and generous.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This resort is set in a setting straight out of a fairy tale. You are in the middle of the most gorgeous jungle and you immediately felt disconnected from the rest of the world - in the best possible way. Our suite overlooking the river was fantastic and the outside balcony made for a great sitting area. The food was amazing and we thoroughly enjoyed all the staff. They were helpful in every way. We also had a massage which was beyond compare. The nature walk is a must but make sure you bring some runners that are not stark white lol. Enjoy. We love this place.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 2泊しましたが、総合的に満足できる滞在でした。良かった点レストランが美味しい(特にパンが)ウブドっぽい雰囲気大声系の大陸の方々に遭遇せず、人口密度が低いコンシェルジュしっかりケアーしてくれるスパも良かったです悪かった点スタッフのおしゃべりがやや冗長(夜10時過ぎにチェックインしてすぐにでもレストランに行きたかったのですが、案内係が日本が大好きだとかなんとかおしゃべりが続きで、長々と当たり前な部屋の使い方を説明。お客さんの要望を汲み取って欲しかったです)蚊帳が隙だらけ外部のレストランは歩いて行ける距離にないウブド中心部から遠いのでグラブは容易に来てくれないsecluded resort with quiet ambience. Restaurant, guest services and SPA are generally good. It was a fairly lengthy and redundant talking by the bellboy when he introduced us the room and facilities. It was past 10pm and we were tired and eager to go to the restaurant which he was supposed to know. Better to
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was such an awesome resort which more than exceeded our expectations. The staff and management could not do enough for us. The Staff have a wonderful happy nature and they made us both feel important to them and like long lost friends. They were very helpful and we had wonderful drivers to all our locations on our daily tours. The Resort is set in an exclusive scene in the beautiful scenery set amongst the natural bush and river below. You would think you were in the middle of nowhere but we were so handy to all amenities in Ubud. I can’t thank the professionalism and natural friendliness of the people working in all aspects of the resort. I would have no qualms in recommending this fabulous resort to anyone wanting luxury and time together as a couple away from the noise and bustle of the city. There are plenty of options regarding activities and cultural events available. Choices are endless and you can create your own itinerary. We are coming back there’s no doubt about that. Thank you everyone at the Kayan Resort.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My partner and I stayed 4 nights here. It became our home away from home. The employees literally said "welcome home" when we would return from leaving the property when going our day trips. Everything here was superb. We stayed at three locations during my holiday in Bali and the Kayon Resort was our favorite. I have zero complaints.Staff:Everyone is super nice, pleasing and personable. They make a real effort to get to know and call us by our names. Everyone treated us with care and provided excellent customer service. The service is over and beyond. One night we had our leftovers from another restaurant warmed up and delivered back to our room. No problem at all. The service alone would make me return and encourage others to stay here. I cannot speak enough about the quality of customer service.Room:We stayed in the river suite. The sound of the river and waterfall is so peaceful. It made our daily coffee on the balcony so pleasant. The view was beautiful. The room was kept clean and tidy daily and nightly. The bed is comfortable, the bathroom is very nice. All in all the room is very inviting.Pool/resort grounds:The pool is small but adequate and looks over the river and lush topography. The grounds are beautiful, romantic and peaceful. location:The resort is a bit hidden away from all the traffic and noise and this we liked. It's a close ride (shuttle provided) to the mix of things in Ubud. It's a perfect distance to provide comfort and serenity yet close enough when you want to get out and explore.Restaurants:We had breakfast every morning at the Kayon and dinner one night and lunch one day at the jetty cafe. The food was good and the presentation lovely. To sum it up, we enjoyed every minute of our stay and every aspect of the resort. If we return to Ubud, we would stay again. I highly recommend The Kayon Resort.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I spent three nights here to explore Ubud area and relax after a liveaboard trip in Komodo National Park. So glad we did - what an amazing experience. Atmosphere, facilities, staff, food! and spa - all exceptional. We had dinner in Ubud as well, but the restaurant at the hotel’s quality cannot be matched! Unique dishes - with amazing flavors. Loved the live artist.The room, staff service and peaceful / beautiful spaces all contributed to the perfect experience. Would love to come back :)
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent our first 5 nights in Bali at the Kayon and what a wonderful start to the holiday. The staff were amazing, very friendly, attentive and happy to help in any way they could - nothing was too much trouble. The room was beautiful, clean and had everything you needed. Quiet and green. Whilst out of town this was no problem as there is a free hourly shuttle bus to and from Ubud. Would highly recommend this beautiful hotel and its staff.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This establishment deserves 10 stars! From the moment we were picked up in the airport to the moment we checked out. The property, the views, the food & the service was excellent! The perfect place for a romantic stay. Each and every staff member was attentive and beyond hospitable. My husband planned a candle light dinner that was hosted by the restaurant in the hotel... talk about a picture perfect dinner! It was an 8 course menu that kept getting tastier with every bite!! Breakfast was offered daily with options from traditional Balinese food to American style breakfast. No other word to describe the whole experience besides EXCELLENT! We loved this resort and all that it had to offer. We will for sure be back for an anniversary in the future! Thank you Kayon Resort for such a memorable experience!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Brilliant place food excellent staff and service top rating hotel the best will be coming back again Gede is very helpful nice man this is a very peaceful hotel for relaxing and unwind is also very clean all food is fresh and cooked by a he finest chef’s over all can not fault
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed for 4 nights at the Kayon Resort and it has exceeded all of our expectations!We were staying at one of the Riverside Villas, with a private pool and wall stone carvings.On arrival we were greeted by the Front Office staff who welcomed us to the resort, had shown us around and answered all of our questions. We felt we were taken care of and looked after as if we were family.We were not expecting this level of care - everyone at the Hotel did their best to make sure we truly enjoyed our stay, and we absolutely did. Everyone would remember you by name, and it felt that this little touch has made all the difference! The attention to detail, the bespoke level of care and service that this place provides is just simply outstanding. Everyone was so warm and welcoming!The Hotel provides hourly shuttle service to Ubud town and back, with the exception of 12.00 & 17.00, which are break times. We have totally forgotten about this and wanted to leave at 12.00.The Hotel staff were the most accommodating: they have dropped us off in Ubud just after 12.00. We were totally not expecting this, but it was such a nice touch from the staff.The little fruit basket that is provided on arrival and filled up daily, the refreshing welcome drink, the umbrellas for when it is raining, the complementary wifi on onboard the shuttle (the journey to Ubud is 20 minutes max.) , the turn down service in the evening are just a few things to name at this incredible Hotel.You were welcomed, looked after and cared for as if we were family. If you are concerned that this place is too far from Ubud town, please do not!The provided shuttle makes it feel like the busyness of Ubud is just around the corner, and it is so nice to come back and enjoy the calm surroundings of the forest!Thank you to everyone who made our stay unforgettable! This has truly been the most amazing Hotel experience ever!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my wife has enjoyed the place and mostly the hospitality throughout our stay. Staff are always checking if everything is fine as a way to ensure our stay at the resort is memorable and memorable.Our room is always clean, thanks to the housekeeping team who works tirelessly in making sure that our rooms are clean.Kepitu staff are always smiling and friendly. Enjoyed the local meals that was served.Another bonus is that there is a free shuttle to go to their other resort "The Kayon Jungle Resort". Another eye candy location, the larger infinity pool and the surrounding greeneries. Its a must visit place. To the front office team headed by Gede, thank you very much for making our stay memorable and wanting to go back.Overall we will rate is as 11/10, as our stay is filled with wonderful memories and experienced one of the best hospitality.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This resort is immersed in the forest and has breathtaking views of the surrounding nature including a river and a waterfall. The rooms are very comfortable and we had a balcony overlooking the river. The staff are well trained and very friendly. The food was excellent and catered to my vegan wife. We did the bike tour on our first day and really enjoyed cycling through the nearby villages and rice fields. Overall a great stay and we will be back soon.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wow!!! This was the second hotel that my wife and I stayed at during our honeymoon. If i had known this was such a beautiful hotel, I would have stayed here the entire time. Beautiful jungle setting with a peace of mind and wonderful staff. I cannot express enough how amazing this place is. If you’re in Bali, this is the place to visit. 10/10, two thumbs up or 5/5. It doesn’t matter what grading scale you use, I guarantee it will be scored the highest.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful relaxing resort set in the jungle away from the hustle and bustle of central Ubud. The hotel and surrounds are stunning and we really enjoyed it after spending 3 days in the heart of Seminyak. Thank you to the staff at the Kayon for all their hospitality during our stay.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel transfer - We'd requested a pickup from the airport and as expected our driver was ready to collect us when we landed. He was polite and warm, and had cold towels and a bottle of water ready for us. In addition, the hotel were kind enough to arrange food for us despite us arriving extremely late in the day, at a time when the restaurant would've been closed. The staff - We found all the staff went the extra mile everyday to ensure we enjoyed our stay. They communicate very well with each other, and remember every detail from our names, activties for the day, to our dietary requirements. Everyone was so lovely, to name a few, Pinky was always so welcoming at reception, Ni luh, Dewa and Mira were attentive and efficient at every encounter at Ke Pitu restaurant, Agung was extremely helpful when we went for afternoon tea. (Apologies if I misspelt any names).Rooms - The rooms were large, spacious and clean. They mosquito lotion, woven bag and additional adapter was a lovely touch.Tours - During our stay we did the temple tour with Gede. In the Kayon spirit he was friendly, provided detail about history and culture which we found very interesting. I'd highly recommend the tour. It ended with a picnic at the rice terraces which was a great way to take a few moments to take in the beauty of our surroundings. The hotel also assisted with booking a downhill cycling tour with an external company which we also enjoyed.Spa - All of our treatments were excellent and extremely relaxing. We prebooked treatments to avoid dissapointment and it was so easy to do online before we even arrived. KePitu - The staff always remembered our dietary requirements and were efficient with taking our order. In particular, during breakfast they'd enquire about your activities to ensure they could serve you in good time before your activities. Basically, we loved our stay. Thank you for making our first time in Bali so memorable for us. Priyal & Rishi
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros- Amazing service. Absolutely amazing!- Food was delicious- Beautiful environment that was incredibly relaxing. Very quiet and tranquil.- Spacious rooms- Did I mention the service was just amazing?Small con- Resort felt a little bit older and it shows in some features. For example, the hot water took a long time to heat up before showering.Wish I could give this a 4.5.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have been to Bali many times and thought so far that we have already experienced the maximum of the hospitality and warmth of the people experienced there.In The Kayon we could experience in 8 days that more is possible.The service there combined with Balinese friendliness is outstanding.We felt very comfortable and would like to spend our holiday there again.The resort is quietly located in a rural setting with a distinctive jungle feel. Due to the very good shuttle service to Ubud, you can escape the silence and experience Ubud.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Amazing staff, food, and beautiful property. The yoga class is great and afternoon tea by the waterfall is an amazing experience. Took the bikes to go into town and explored the rice fields. The welcome drink was so good that we ordered 3 of them. The staff is extremely nice and professional.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Kayon for 5 nights looking to unwind and enjoy the natural setting, and the whole experience couldn’t have been better.The hotel had only a few rooms, but was beautifully designed so it felt spacious and the facilities and communal areas were never too busy. The rooms were very comfortable, and the hotel seemed to have thought of everything a guest could need and provided it. The beds were super comfy and we slept so well in the wonderful peaceful surroundings. This extended to the activities on offer, twice daily yoga classes were included (not too challenging for a beginner!) and a daily walk to the village to see the rice fields and get a sense of how the locals live. The pool was small but gorgeous, just about big enough for lengths and perfect for a cooling dip with a feeling of being immersed in the jungle. The two real high points (if I could speak any more highly of the Kayon!) were the service and the food.The staff were excellent - they were friendly and so accommodating, but at the same time were always open to have a chat and a smile and tell you about themselves in a way that felt very genuine. They had obviously been picked and trained well by the hotel. It’s great the way they take trainees from the local villages. The staff knew each guest by name, and were always happy to help in any way they could.The food was delicious and so fresh. We had expected to sample a few local restaurants in Ubud, but ended up eating at the hotel every evening because the food was just so fabulous. The breakfast was amazing, generous portions of everything, fresh bread and home made jam...fresh juices... beware of potential for weight gain. The BBQ night was another highlight. My only advice to the Kayon following our stay is - please don’t change! You are perfect.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 4 nights and had a wonderful time. Staff could not do enough for you. The facilities are excellent and food in the restaurant was delicious. We were assisted at any time and nothing was a problem. The staff helped us organise our own personal tour itinerary and the driver was great company and shared so much information with us on the trip. It has been a great stay and would love to return! Thank you.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family and I had two days here, and we had such a wonderful experience at this resort that all of us were extremely sad when we were leaving the airport because everything exceeded our expectations, and we felt at home here. The staffs are extremely friendly, helpful, kind, and patient as they truly pay attention to the guests' needs. One memory that I would never forget is when the staffs taught me to wear sarong. The swimming pool and the resort's scenery are beautiful as I felt myself having a chance to merge into nature and appreciate the resources that nature has always provided us. The room is modern, convenient, and comfortable. Overall, everything here is perfect. This resort has made my vacation in Bali more memorable.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I surprised my best friend by taking her here for her 30th. I’m American but live in Dubai and wanted to visit Bali for vacation. I have literally never experienced such unparalleled service. The staff were excellent, attentive, kind and incredibly thoughtful. The resort was stunning, with handcrafted details in every nook and cranny. Without even asking the staff surprised my friend with a birthday cake at the restaurant. The food at the restaurant was incredible. I’m not usually big on just repeating restaurants especially in a place like Bali But we weren’t disappointed. The chef even specially baked me gluten free bread every morning (which was delicious - Chef eddy I need that recipe!) One more detail - the resort has a waterfall and we got to watch monkeys play in the mornings by the waterfall & one morning we even woke up to them outside our balcony! Was fascinating to see the monkey family interact. A huge thanks to the staff as the beauty, unparalleled service and gorgeous location of the resort were incredible. If I come back to Bali I would come here in an instant. And would highly recommend! 10/10 from both of us.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked 7 nights in this amazing resort, and we enjoyed our time from day one, super rooms, accommodations and superb locotion, not far away from Ubud city and right in the middle off the rice fields, the staff around you are so friendly and helpful all the time, and I never will forget them for all they did for us, thank you so much to everyoneWe loves you all xxx For sure I will comes back on this place.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great 2 days here...the staff is friendly and helpful and the room is just great! Awesome pool and overall a fun experience.the experience overall was fantastic n relaxing. The spa was amazing!my thanks to all the staff!we truly loved your home.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place is beautiful and the service is as good as it gets! The staff was so friendly and helpful. Room and facilities were beautiful. So much beauty in Ubud I wish I had more than the 6 nights we stayed. Sitting at the beach now in Seminyak and missing the Kayon Resort and Ubud.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful stay! My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights. From start to finish every staff member was polite and kind. The facilities are all super clean, not to mention smell amazing. We ate at La Kepita for most of our meals- absolutely delicious. Really enjoyed the tradional Balinese breakfast along with the traditional Indonesian breakfast. We also did a candlelight dinner- which was really sweet and the service was lovely. The food at dinner was really good too :) overall this is a lovely, quiet place to relax and enjoy the rainforest. Can’t say enough about the staff members- so polite and very impressed with their English . Thank you for a great stay Kayon!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved it it was total fun in the resort itself.Disciplined staff,total hygiene it is the perfect stay in Indonesia.I was like why to go outside the resort its total fun inside.Good food,great drinks,pools,spas evrythng.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, great environment.Infinity pool is amazing.Great service.Suitable for those who like rustic hotels.Middle of jungle.Great waterfall view.Photosession available.Suites not very big.Gifts for honeymooners.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff are all very attentive and friendly. Always making sure that we have all that we need. There’s even a mosquito repellant! Free shuttle every hour to Ubud center is a plus! Food is also great! Highly recommend this resort!!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recently visited The Kayon Resort as a part of our Honeymoon. We were lucky enough to be there for 6 nights in one of the pool villas. We arrived quite late and the staff were so friendly on our arrival. They took our bags straight down to the room and we got took on a tour of the hotel. Once arriving in the room, they showed us everything in the room and how different things worked.The resort itself is so peaceful and secluded, with a relaxing atmosphere. We stayed at our private pool most days with no interruptions or loud noises to disturb us. It was truly relaxing, just what we wanted for our honeymoon. The food in the restaurant was amazing. There was a huge choice at breakfast, varying from continental to Indonesian. You certainly will not go hungry! We ate in the restaurant every evening we stayed in the hotel. The food was always brilliant and enjoyed the atmosphere. The staff in the hotel are exceptional. Every single one of them always greeted you and asked how we were. They went out of their way to ensure you were enjoying your stay and went above and beyond to get you everything. Overall, this hotel is outstanding. If you want to go somewhere that is beautiful and relaxing, this is definitely the place to visit.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hospitality and friendliness of the staff is beyond words. They made our stay in Bali and at the Kayon Resort more than we could ever have imagined. Everybody from the restaurant staff, to the room service staff, to the concierge and everyone else was so polite and did everything in their power to make our trip incredible. I would recommend The Kayon Resort to anybody traveling to Bali and staying in Ubud. A truly unforgettable experience made only better by staying at the Kayon. The views at the property are also breathtaking including the waterfall, the room views, the infinity pool looking out into the jungle. Just a spectacular place to stay!!!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I don't usually write reviews because I'm the "why bother" type of person. However, if I didn't write a review for The Kayon Resort Ubud it would be a sin.Prior To Arrival:I have been in contact with the resort prior to my arrival as I was booking transfer service from the airport to the resort. We arrived late and there were delays in getting our baggage but the driver waited patiently with our names printed on a sign and he was very gracious and nice. He helped us with our luggage and we had good conversation for 1.5 hours to our resort.Arrival to the Resort:We were greeted by 3-4 staff but the first person to speak to us was Wibi. He was very welcoming, asked about our flight, assisted with our bags, and gave us some general information. It wasn't your regular guest service welcome because he was very genuine and attentive. I didn't go through any hassle with checking in and my husband and I sat comfortably in their lobby while they got all the information ready. A very lovely staff member assisted us to our room. She showed us around the facilities and escorted us to our room where she also explained the features and provided more hotel information (spa, pool, restaurant etc). What stood out was their respect for the environment. There was an ant on the table and naturally instead of flicking the ant off the table, the staff member slowly carried the ant and ensured its placement elsewhere (so much respect for the environment/animals - so refreshing to see!)Hotel:Now I know why this place is 5 stars - really, it should be more! There were beautiful flowers on our bed with a customized welcome note. On the second day after a fun filled sight seeing day - there was a flower bath awaiting us in the room.The facilities are immaculate, there is so much respect for Balinese culture throughout the resort. The cleanliness and maintenance is spectacular. This hotel is situated in the heart of the forest and the design and rooms really utilize the beauty of the trees and it's gorgeous waterfall perfectly. We rented the hotel scooter and took the car shuttle to Ubud market (by the way, their shuttle even has Wi-Fi!). It was easy process and staff ensured our safety.Our room was situated with the flowing river below so you can hear the river from inside the room or on the balcony - so magical.Staff:Every staff member is so nice! Each person remembered our names and greeted you as if you were family. I remember Agung who was leaving the hotel and we were coming back from the market. He was already off his shift but he insisted on carrying our bags to the lobby.Every staff was so knowledgeable about the area and recommended restaurants or places to visit. Each staff member ensured our needs were met. When we would change our schedule, they were very accommodating.What really stood out was when we left at 7am for day trips, they would provide/pack boxes of croissants/Danish and water bottles for us. When we left for 2am trekking to mount batur - they provided us with fruits, water, and hard boiled eggs (amazing!).We met Gede who was the Resort Manager who was incredibly nice and welcoming - apparently he was trying to catch us for a few days. He left a note in our room and because of our long stay, offered a complimentary dinner at their incredible restaurant. It was a lovely dinner - a perfect night for my husband and I.I recommend this resort to every one! Thank you Kayon Resort Ubud for making our honeymoon the most memorable experience. Many blessings to each person at Kayon!Terimakasih
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had very good experience here. The staffs are kind and lovely. They offered a lot of activities. Morning yoga and walking. Definitely try the restaurant here. Breakfast and afternoon high tea are delicious.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: During our Bali holiday we stayed 2 nights in the Kayon Resort and were so sad to leave.Everything about this hotel is perfect ! They have a wonderful staff, which anticiped every need we could have, amazing therapists at the Serayu spa and great complimentary activities. The infinity pool in the middle of the jungle was one of our Highlights. The hotel is very calm and cosy ( be prepared to meet some geckos though :-) ) We will certainly come back !Terima Kasih !
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Kayon Resort was our second hotel we stayed during our honeymoon in Bali. From arrival we were welcomed with a flower garland and flower for behind our ear. Check in was smooth and easy and we were taken to the hotel sign with a silver umbrella “for king and queens” for a welcome photo. The reception staff then escorted us to the restaurant overlooking the infinity pool which was out of this world. We received a welcome drink which was so delicious and the staff offered us lunch. The staff were all so kind and friendly at all times, nothing was too much trouble. The hotel has no escalators which was actually very refreshing and made the walk down to our villa (villa 5) even more exciting. When staff opened the lock on our door and allowed us to enter we was greeted by our private infinity pool overlooking the river where we could here the waterfall flowing. The decking, pool and sun loungers were so clean. We was then shown into our villa where the bed was decorated in the honeymoon decoration and a lovely welcome scroll and card from management congratulating us in our honeymoon. In our villa we had a glass wall which showed the continuation of the love story carved in the wall on the walk down the hotel towards the canon jetty. We thought this was a lovely touch as they have installed a light into this to show it throughout the night. There was mosquito netting around the bed. We was provided with a daily replenished fruit basket that included not just your normal fruit but Balinese fruit too which was a lovely touch. We was guided around the room by the hotel staff and then she explained about the Ubud shuttle bus and different facilities around the hotel. We was provided with a free bookmark and bag as well as postcards to send home to our family making them all jealous. In the bathroom there was a hairdryer, iron, ironing board, the coffee and tea making facilities and the most beautiful bath and shower. The bath was decorated in flowers on our arrival which added such a lovely touch to the already beautiful room. The bath was against a huge window that overlooked the jungle which was so relaxing and lush. The hotel provide a mosquito spray protector and also a plug in. My husband got bitten quite badly in Bali and the hotel staff offered to completely change all our bedding and towels in the room just incase it was anything in there which was so nice of them. Our first night we ate out which was arranged before our trip to Bali. The staff were happy to provide us with a taxi to this restaurant and also offered to arrange a taxi home for us which was lovely. During our second day we spent time in the main pool with some cocktails and food before going for afternoon tea on the cannon jetty with the waterfall in the background and spending the evening in our private pool. We then had a candlelight dinner as part of our honeymoon package. The food was absolutely out of this world. Our host Adguce was a trainee at the hotel at the time but you would never know. He was amazing with us and explained each of the courses perfectly. He also helped us choose which wine to have which we had the HATTEN aga red (highly recommended by us) the food was cooked to perfection. The decoration was so romantic with flower petals, candles and a huge heart full of candles. The experience was a memory we will have for a lifetime. On our final day we had a couples Balinese massage at the hotel spa which was so relaxing. The room was beautiful and had big glass windows overlooking the jungle. The spa staff were so friendly and asked lots of questions on whether we had any areas we would like them to focus more on. They provided 3 different oils which we could choose which one we wanted the massage completed in. They suggested the lavender oil for my husband to help with his bites and I chose the lemongrass. The staff was very professional throughout the entire massage. On our final day the Kayon resort offered to transfer us to our next hotel using their air conditioned car which was so lovely. They all lines in a row to wave goodbye to us on our departure and offered us sparkling water to take on our journey to seminyak. Thank you so much to all of you at the kayon resort. You made our honeymoon in Bali so amazing and nothing was too much trouble
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 3 nights during our trip to Bali. This is an amazing resort with outstanding facilities and customer service. I would like to thank Gede and his team for making our stay such a memorable experience from start to finish. We look forward to returning in the near future and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to our family and friends. It is truly an exceptional place.
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment we arrived we knew this was going to be special. The most beautiful, relaxing place with staff to match. Very attentive to making our stay exactly what we needed. The food was excellent, spa facilities superb. We highly recommend this wonderful find!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a great hotel to get away from central Ubud. It’s quiet, clean, and peaceful. Lots of honeymooners and no kids so it’s relaxing. The staff is lovely and helped out after my wife got sick at Mudra (don’t eat at Mudra).
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a fantastic dinner here last Friday which lucky for us was cultural dance night. Good service and food with an unforgettable experience. Thank you so much we hope to come and stay next time we visit Bali
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I will have to start with the service at this hotel, which is truly exceptional. Everyone from reception, housekeeping, restaurant was very warm and friendly without being overbearing. Apologies for not remembering their names. The setting was amazing, you’re right in the middle of a jungle and next to a waterfall. If you’re lucky, you can catch a glimpse of monkeys swinging in the trees! We spent one day going to the Tegunungan, the rice fields, and Mount Batur. Kadek was our private driver and he was so friendly and flexible. Little things like having a cooler (with cold water and towels) in the private SUV were very much appreciated. Breakfast at the Kepitu restaurant was outstanding. You could skip lunch because it was just too much food! The hourly shuttle to Ubud was very convenient. Our room was great - the bed was very comfortable, the strong AC was a relief from the overwhelming heat and humidity outside, the zen-inspired bathroom was clean and spacious. A funny thing happened on our last day - we got a call from front desk informing us that our check-out date was not that day but the day after.
