We were chatting with housekeeping and the housekeeping manager earlier and had told them we were checking out that morning. They must have informed front desk who immediately called us. Turned out I was mistaken:) We were so happy - who wouldn't want to spend another day at this amazing hotel!
hotelName:
21    The Kayon Resort
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Such a wonderful hotel. Despite that there is hardly any place next to The pool to keep an eye on your child. We were upgraded to a bigger room. ThankYou! They handle complaints really well however complaining about The f & b seemsLike a lost cause. I feel really sorry for The Waiters / waitresses. They are doing their Utmost but kitchen needs to be trained as well. Mail courses never came together. While My friend finished i didnt Even get mine yet. And This just didnt happen once. IT also took soooooo long for our lunch. Fries were cold. I amStill in The hotelRight now. Waiting for French Fries which i ordered about 45 min ago. The f&b outlets need to be trained in so many ways. Such a shame for such a lovely hotel. We Will not be eating here anymore as iT just takes too long. The waiters run like crazy but its stilling enough. The Spa is one of the most beautiful ive ever seen in Bali and i have seen quite a few.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is so far the top notch Resort that I stay. Service is 5 stars. Raigan and Miana will make sure you are well take care of, very very friendly. And also the kids corner, they are super friendly too! My kids love the resort stay so much that they wanted to come back again. Pro:Far from noisy area like Kuta, peaceful and nice beach, some restaurants and massage is in walking distance or you can took a taxi to nearby restaurant. You are spoil with choices. Room facing sea is spacious, clean, and the bed is comfortable, good water pressure for shower. (Do note that this room will get a bit noisy if there is any function near the pool. The inconsiderate guest continue to party and talking loudly till 12 even I think the function end at 10pm)Kids below 12 eat for free when u order a main course from the menu. (We ordered porridge due to my wife no feeling well and porridge is not in the menu. Thinking that it's a main course and the waiter also did not highlight to us. Was shock when we make the payment, because our kids meal is charge in the bill :( ) Kids corner is fun for my two little monkey. Full of activities available for my kids, they love the cookies making session!Beach is clean.Breakfast is yummy, Pasar Market Restaurant food is also yummy. Love the Pizza! Burger! Fried noodle.Two thumbs up to the hotel Frontline stuff. All are hardworking and always greet you with a smile.Con:Room facing main road is noisy, I don't think they can do anything about it.Pool water is cold. Especially the inner pool.Kids pool water bucket is under maintenance, only one slide. My kids get bored after few try, maybe they can create more waterplay.Overall, it's a full star resort with some room of improvement. We definitely will be back again!
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent two nights here and wished we spent our entire trip here!!! From check in everything was perfect, 5 star customer service, super easy check in and that entrance atrium is amazing!Our room was stunning! We were upgraded to ‘partial beach view’ but our room had FULL beach view. The shower and bathroom are marble and similar to staying in a 6 star resort. The bed was super comfortable and loved the pillow menu.We didn’t have kids with us but it’s definitely a kids paradise still with lots of area for adults to chill out also. Only area for improvement was the Nudi Bar management. The bar attendants are very green (maybe still in training), not very attentive and seemed very overwhelmed all day with orders. It was a long wait for drinks/food with our friends order being lost completely. The Balinese themed dinner was excellent, breakfast was the best we’ve ever had in our lives! Such a huge selection and well cooked! Just be careful you get down early, they seem to start packing away breakfast at 10.15am for a 10.30am close.You have an array of water sports right out front of the resort... for couples there is a luxury bar with tapas on the beach right next door to holiday inn with fast service and great cocktails (free tapas during happy hour, you must try the squid chilli jam) at the Priya Villas on beach- well worth the 10 metre walk!We will definitely be back to Holiday Inn, loved every moment xxx
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked one of their atrium pool access room and it was really convenient as the swimming pool just outside the room. Very friendly staff and they have lovely play room for the children. We order room service a few times and the food was just ok nothing great. Lots of choices for the buffet breakfast. The beach is nice and clean. Overall a good family friendly resort.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: its a nice hotel with a good location and good amenities. Stayed with family for 3 nights. The room was spacious and clean. The food was average. Breakfast had a lot of variety. The only problem - all the plates smelled of egg. For vegetarian people that might be an issue. Best part - kids eat for free! The beach area is small but well kept. The beach itself has sea weed growth so no great surf.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recently stayed 6 nights at the Holiday Inn Tanjung Benoa. The hotel met all our needs and was very clean and well maintained. The greatest asset to this hotel are the staff who were very friendly and went out of their way to help out whenever they could. When we arrived at the hotel our son wasn't feeling well so Juli at reception did her very best to check us in a bit early and let us use the departure lounge until the room was ready :) The staff at the entrance were friendly and would always ask how we were and what our plans were. Even the security staff would help you get across the road if the traffic was heavy.I need to say a special 'shout out' to Sugi for his fruit carving expertise when my daughter joined the class on the activity schedule, not only is he talented but he also was great to talk to !!!The only thing that may be lacking is things for older children to do, you could see they have a fantastic kids club for younger children but not so much for 12 and 14 year olds. The food and beverage quality was very good and the prices were reasonable so we found we ate in the hotel a few evenings. The breakfast buffet was amazing we found heaps of choice and it was very well run by all the staff...loved being able to get a freshly made latte coffee each morning :)
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recently stayed in this hotel for 6 nights, 5 days as a holiday package promotion of an Aussie airline. We are so happy we chose this hotel, especially that that was our first time to visit Bali. Its location is perfect for those who like some peace, relaxation and fun with your family, away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta and Seminyak. We loved the pool and the beach, the breakfast buffet, and the cleanliness of the room and hotel amenities. Most of all, we were so impressed with the service. The staff were so warm, friendly, helpful and super attentive to our needs. We actually miss the hotel than Bali itself because of our great experience there. We will highly recommend it to our friends and family who will visit Bali soon.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I love the place. Tranquil at some place and Generally very family-oriented resort. I will be thrilled to go on my own the next time round -) Service there was unexpectedly thumbs up throughout. For me and my Husband, it was like a chill-out break. We slept through the visit and their room service (f&b) was really good. The pool and whole environment is clean and nice .
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 2 weeks at this resort on Benoa Beach, Bali. We absolutely loved it. First and foremost, a huge shout out to the fantastic employees of the hotel. Every single person working at the hotel, no matter in what capacity, was friendly, always smiling, always concerned about your well being, always checking how they could help us, do more for us, really anything. They were there to please the guests and that they certainly did over and over again. Without hesitation I can say that the employees went above and beyond everyday and did so willingly and without hesitation. The best employees of any hotel we have ever stayed in, anywhere in the world!!!We upgraded our room to an ocean view. The room was very comfortable, nice size bathroom, great shower, lovely queen size bed with both soft and firm pillows, nice patio with 2 chairs and a small table. Adequate toiletries in the bathroom. During the two weeks we stayed, I would have loved it if the floor was washed and the windows cleaned. That's my only small complaint.The main restaurant in the hotel had both indoor and outdoor seating and a daily buffet breakfast was included. There was a big selection of food and beverages to choose from, all delicious. I would have liked the hot food to be hotter though. Eggs could be made to order. Again, the restaurant staff were fantastic. The restaurant was open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.There was a swim up pool bar which also had seating available out of the pool for refreshments and food.The swimming pool was very large with three areas. One pool area was inside the hotel but was open air, the other two areas, were outside in the open. Clean beach towels were available everyday. There was plenty of balls and such available for children. There was also a supervised, dedicated playroom for children.The actual beach area had lots of sun lounges. We did not use the beach as we didn't care for the gritty sand and the loads of seaweed in the water as well as occasional garbage item. The tide would go out for hours on end and when this occurred during the day there was no water to swim in. Water sports such as sea-doos could only be used when the tide was in.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 4 nights at Holiday Inn Resort at Benoa , Bali for 4 nights for our family vacation . Firstly the resort is located in a strip of road next to Beach with everything closeby for daily needs . The road is lined up with many beach resorts and one can choose from multiple places to eat with easy access. The location is excellent and with easy access to beach it’s just heaven . This area is famous for its water sports so a big plus if one wants to explore that as well. Now coming to resort , it’s mostly like a 4.5 star resort with nice clean and modern rooms . Breakfast spread is vast and a big plus . Nudi beach bar at Resort is a very chilled out and relaxing place for a drink in the evening by the sea . It has happy hours daily from 4 to 6pm and then from 10 to midnight , so you get one free drink as bonus . Overall many activities for small kids but slightly bigger kids will feel bored there . Room service is nice and staff is very friendly but that’s every where in Bali where people are overly friendly and welcoming towards tourists. I would recommend this resort as it’s in a lovely beach facing location and with everything easily accessible closeby including laundry which is much cheaper outside . Getting cabs outside hotel is like so easy and one need not wait for even 5 minutes for that , again a big plus .
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best holiday ever, hotel was great, staff couldn't do enough very informative. Definitely go there again. Lots to do on the beach, which was cleaned every morning. We were on a package trip, couldn't have asked for more, weather was great.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We received a very warm welcome from Jeni and Atmaja and were upgraded to an Ocean View room on the top floor for our four night stay.The resort is in an excellent family friendly location on a safe sandy beach and has a very relaxing chilled out atmosphere. The room was clean and bed was very comfortable with a modern bathroom and a furnished balcony. The sound of the gentle ocean waves (this area has a natural barrier a few hundred meters out) and cool breeze made it an extra relaxing experience whether on the sun beds on the beach, the balcony or the bedroom.The photo session by Stamp produced some very good photos and while you get one free print, Stamp was such a good photographer that we purchased eleven digital images :) We throughly enjoyed our stay and would be happy to recommend it to family and friends.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff are very friendly and accomodating. Since my husband is an IHG member, we are treated very well. From the moment we arrived in bali airport until be leave, we were taken cared of. I think from all the properties of Holiday Inn, this is the best I've ever been. The place, rooms, food are great, but most specially hospitality and warmth of the staff. One of the reasons we want to go back to Bali is this place. Great job!
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have total 6 friends went to Bali for a leisure trip after our 15 years of friendship! This was my first time stayed in Holiday Inn Resort and the swimming pool and the beach got me “wow” relaxed. We had lots of fun playing in the swimming pool and relaxing at the beach side. The breakfast buffet was great! It’s worth for a stay.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There is a place in this world, where tradition is lived, not just respected. Come to Bali, if you want to see tradition in action. In the land of Small Gods, people are super nice and superstitious. Be careful where you tread, so that you do not step on the homage for the local spirit. Respect the local beliefs. Try arak and enjoy the time of your life diving, snorkeling or otherwise experiencing Bali and its diverse nature, delicious local cuisine and vivid culture. Say „matur suksama“ with a small bow and the marvels of local kindness will be yours to savior. I stayed in the very family friendly (and reasonably priced) Holiday Inn Resort and that proved a wonderful starting point for my spa and culinary explorations. I will do my best to come here again and find out more about the land of the Small Gods.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The resort is set up awesome for kids and there are plenty of activities for them to enjoy , from the awesome kids club to the 3 swimming pools.The food is also very good, especially the pizza it is excellent, and made really well. The staff are always friendly and more than helpful to any of your needs , with nothing being to much trouble.We would highly recommend , especially for a family holiday, our daughter had a excellent time at the resort. And we would not hesitate to return.One more mention would be the spa( tea tree spa) it is great, myself and my wife agree that is probably the best masage we have had at a resort in Bali and we have been to quite a few different ones. The treatments on offer are quite well priced and the masages are great.In conclusion the service is great at the resort, also the food is good and really well priced, and kids eat free when you order a main course. So all in all highly recommend.The only thing I would say is we had a pool access room which was very nice, and had direct access into the atrium pool which is quite shaded but does get some sun as day goes on, but we found the pool to cold to swim in, and only used this pool twice for 10mins each time , in the week we stayed.It wasn’t a problem for us we used the main pool everyday which gets nice a warm in the sun. You also have the direct beach access with sun loungers on beach which is very nice also, and there are plenty of staff and security around all the time.Thankyou holiday inn, benoa for a great week, we will definitely be back.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s hard to write an analytical review on this property, as it’s the staff that make the stay world class. There are so many lovely people that work at the Holiday Inn Bali Benoa that I would insult too many if I were to not mention their names… Ritni the front office manager, Juni and Christian at guest services, each and every one of the 20 odd people we spoke to whilst dining, and literally EVERY single employee deserve to be congratulated for making guests feel welcome. Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa is located in a family friendly, thus less raucous region of Bali. The resort is tucked in between the Conrad to the North, and a posh Royal Santrian all-villa resort to the South. A few minutes’ walk further south you'll find the big-name luxury resorts like Melia, Westin, Sofitel, Club Med and Laguna.This property has created a niche market for itself. An affordable yet decent beach resort plugged between the costlier mega properties around it. The property does not have the expansive lawns as does its 2 neighbours, but I don’t think you need that in Bali, as you could freely walk along the promenade and day-visit any of the surrounding properties in Nusa Dua. Nusa Dua will always be the area I'd want to stay when in Bali, and at the price of this Holiday Inns accommodations it's certainly a very good option. Our family of 4 had a Tanjung Kids Adventure Suite which offers a separate "room" with a bunk-bead, beanbags, TV and Playstation for the kids. This was great as it gave the little people their own space. The only negative to this particular room category is that it faces the road, and only has the slightest sea view. The grandparents had a partial sea view King room though, and this would also have been perfect for us had we not taken the kids along.The resort itself is a Holiday Inn through and through. You know what you’re going to get, as a Holiday Inn Resort anywhere in the world is going to be exactly the same as any other one anywhere else in the world! The Hotel only opened in 2015, so it still feels new and fresh. I do feel that the hotel is kind of squeezed in on a narrower lot between its neighbours, thus necessitating a rectangular building. The pool / pools however flow pretty much the whole length of the inner section, so there’s loads of cooling down areas! If there is one thing I have to fault the resort on, it’s the F&B department. NOT the Food though, but the delivery of it. We spent 10 nights at the resort, and on most occasions, food took quite long to reach us, and most times if we ordered drinks at the same time, then both the drinks and meals would arrive a good 30 to 40 minutes later. Having said this, I have never stayed in a hotel anywhere in the world where staff at all levels were more accommodating, and more eager to please. Eg, I ordered a Caesar Salad which comes with optional Satay Chicken. I asked them to change the satay to grilled chicken instead, and the waiter did not even question the request. He next day I’d request some other off-menu item, and that too would be very happily arranged.Bottom line: It’s a Holiday Inn. If you want the Ritz, then pay for the Ritz. Holiday Inns are great value resorts, and this particular property will remain a favorite for me with a big family outing, as the staff really just are so great.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: With Bali getting busier and busier, it’s great to find a place that still have that Bali charm. Kids well catered for. Beach is ok for swimming. but the pool and pool bar are excellent. Breakfast included and has something for everyone. the staff are great. and with freeway from airport it’s really good spot. also close to nusa dua but far enough away. highly recommend
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We went on a family trip to Bali (2 seniors, 2 Adults, 1 child-6Y) for a week, and this hotel had something for everyone. Location of Nusa Dua is apt for the families, it has ample of good hotels, supermarkets, diners, good beaches, and water sports - at the same time happening places such as Kuta/Seminyak, and Jimbaran are 20-30 minutes car ride away. The room was spacious, and had a balcony with view of the sea. Breakfast spread was sumptuous, with variety of continental and Asian options. We usually headed to the pool/beach by the morning, and remained there till 5pm - enjoying drinks at the beach/pool restaurant and water activities, the day ended up having dinner at a seafood restaurant at Jimbaran or at nearby restaurants. The kids club is a hit, our daughter had so much fun just due to the kids club - it had a play area, lots of activities, TV, and caretakers to look after - kudos to them. We refrained from taking day trips, however, headed to Ubud for 1 day - it was a good experience of the Balinese culture and handicraft. The hotel staff is very friendly and caring - they all greeted with a smile (I remember having great chats with Ayuni and Widhi at the Nudi bar). An authorised money exchange is just opposite the hotel within the supermarket. Local handicraft shops are close by - don’t forget to bargain. Indian restaurants are also within 5-7 minutes walking distance - meals at the hotel are great too.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The website shows a hotel dedicated to kids and the family; disappointing on arrival as this is not completely reflective in reality. We booked the Tanjung family kids adventure suite, the kids bathroom was not well lit. Housekeeping was not done on time. The kids menu is very limited and some items don't come with French Fries. Breakfast is not bad. The Tea Tree Spa is value for money and clean. Staff are very friendly. The hotel organizea a cocktail reception for its guests once a week; a nice touch.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The reception was very welcoming to us. Especially “Rani” was very helpful with everything in our first days in the hotel. Since we don’t know the area, we had questions. We felt very comfortable with asking questions and good help. Thank you Rani again for all your help during our stay in Holiday Inn, Bali :)
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We recently stayed with holiday innVery nice hotelGreat sevice Great foodFantastic kids clubPools and bar great and beach areaInitial mix up with our booking however front office manager offered our family a complementary dinner by way of apology which was very niceUnfortunately the last few days the whole family got a nasty ear infection and it cost us $350 to see the doctor Thankfully we had travel insurance for such things and will get some of our money backAll in all though we would definately recommend this hotel especially to families with younger children
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Holiday Inn Bali Benoa is just perfect for families with small kids . The beach is clean and safe for small kids . The whole set up is such that parents can keep an eye on the kids while they are in the pool or beach while they themselves are relaxing on the beach beds .They have the best kids club I have seen till date . Complete with a ball pool slide , trampoline , many games and movies . My kids were either on the beach or the kids club and I had the most relaxing vacation ever .There are also many good Indian restaurants in the vicinity . So good for Indian families as well .Hotel has an amazing breakfast spread . There is something for everyone .The rooms were very clean and staff always smiling and ever courteous .We will definitely stay here if we ever visit Bali again .
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel, facilities are very complete. Don't like the lay out of the room and when raining lobby, swimming pool area a bit smelly. Is a very nice hotel, nice pool, nice beach, friendly staff, nice kids club, clean swimming pool
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was my first stay in Holiday Inn Resort Benoa.They gave me good impression since airport pick up until drive me back to airport. They drivers were polite and professional in what they did. The following impression was the in room check and the staff, Christian explained all hotel facilities. I must say that this hotel was beautiful and pay attentions to cleanliness, convenience, safety and security.The food was also very tasty. The breakfast was complete. They provided since traditional, continental, American and English breakfast. But the most impressive was the kid's corner. Very attentive.They also have this beautiful pool including one kid's pool with a big bucket shower and slide.They emphasize their family resort by providing kids play. There were like four attendants would take care of your kids. And this facility is safe and free. Once you registered you would be asked to be photo taken.For you who like spa, they also have one with good therapist like Juni. She was very polite and attentive also communicative. One last thing which was good although for smoker like me. They only have three smoking area which were near the beach, one is near the bar and another one was in the drop off area.There were some staffs who gave me beautiful stay impressions, they were the drivers who picked me up and drive me to airport, Onix the guest relations, Ayuni who always welcome me when I had breakfast and that guy in the photo leisure counter, also those two guys who gave me turn down service. You are rock. The leisure photo staff will give you one free shot and print for you for free including showing you the best spot options.I will see you again on my next visit.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel, it's Kind of kids friendly resort. My kids loves this hotel and did'nt wanna leave on last day our stayed. The food were amazing, a lot of choices and the tasted was all good. The rooms are very clean and they gave us connecting rooms. We were enjoying our stay in this resort and sure this hotel such a very recommended to family relaxing with.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was impressed for the beautiful hotel and huge pool. the personnel is incredibly friendly. the food of the restaurants is very bad. besides the breakfast, I wouldn't recommend to eat here.the rooms are very spacious and comfortable, our room had a terrace and I left my clothes to dry in hangers. one day before leaving I noticed my rashguard shirt was missing. I thought it might fly away with a strange wind but nothing fell and the didn't found anything. it just disappear from my room.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were pleasantly surprised by this hotel. We had stayed in Sanur at the Hyatt immediately before staying at Holiday in Bali Benoa for double the price and this was far better. The staff were very welcoming and easy to deal with. We have stayed in Tanjung Benoa a couple of times previously and would say that this is a little bit far from the main restaurants. However that said, there are plenty of options around the hotel to get food and convenience items. The breakfast selection is very good and changed daily offering good variety across our 6 day stay. The rooms were spacious, well appointed with excellent air-conditioning. The kids club was great and the staff lovely. While the pools only have a maximum depth of 120cm, they were extensive with plenty of shade. When I lost my sunglasses, the staff went out of their way to find them - eventually locating them following an inadvertent theft by a 3 year old child. The front desk were also very helpful in scanning some documents for me. The negative of this property is that the number of pool chairs is completely disproportionate to the number of rooms. Although we were there during a quiet period, the number of chairs around the pool is completely inadequate. Otherwise, this a good, solid option for an affordable family holiday.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Medium size hotel at benoa near nusa dua. Only 20 minutes from airport. Friendly staff and nice hotel rooms. Pools are good for children because max depth is only 120 cm. 3 different pools. Kids klub is open 9 am- 9 pm. Food is good and not over priced. Beach is clean and safe. Lot’s of water activities.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 6 nights with the All Inclusive Package it is surely the way to go.The staff were so friendly & helpful & there was quite a selection of drinks & food from the All Inclusive menus.Although our flight did not leave until 9:10pm & we had a late check out @ 1pm we were able to have access to their day room until our transfer arrived.We would definitely have another holiday @ Holiday Inn.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in a Ocean Front Suite. WOW! The room was huge with uninterrupted ocean views, highly recommend staying in the this room category. The staff we're very friendly and helpful to all requests. Heaps of choice for places to eat all within easy walking distance otherwise plenty of restaurant options at the resort.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed with family and friends at this wonderful resort a few weeks ago. And can’t wait to go back. The resort, being new, has been well planned out with bright and fresh furnishings. We all stayed in the pool access rooms, having our own pool lounges, deck (where we played cards) and stairs into one of the four pools (with own swim-up pool bar). The staff are a real asset too. The first morning at breakfast a staff member realised we were new and asked if we had any dietary requirements. I’m a vegetarian so she walked me through the vegetarian section and offered to make a suitable rice / noodle dish going forward (I was to give notice the previous day). I have never experienced this before so was very impressed. Also impressive is egg ordering, on each table is an order sheet where one can choose 1-2-3 egg scrambled, poached, boiled or omelettes (with fillings). Hand it to the staff member and they deliver once cooked. Again with it being a new resort, the air-conditioned restaurant was welcomed (I’ve stayed in many resorts with breakfast room outdoors). Those who wish to sit outside are catered for too. The lunch and dinner food options were plenty and tasty. The Nudi Bar / Restaurant is well set-up too, it is sunken so you can be at the same height as people swimming. Along one side is a table-top which swimmers can use when eating and drinking (sitting on in-built pool stools). As can happen at any hotel, we did experience a problem with one of the rooms (pipe leaked in ceiling) but they quickly got engineers in to investigate. Unfortunately it wasn’t fixed the first time so they relocated one of our rooms to an upstairs suite. It wasn’t ideal as our rooms were interconnecting but we made do as only two nights remaining. Manager Regan was quick to come up with solutions to make it of little inconvenience to us. I do have to mention the bathrooms (in rooms) have frosted window along shower and door to bathroom (which afforded little privacy when both on toilet and in shower). We ended up showering in the dark (I was staying with a niece). Can I please suggest you make these minor changes. Overall, we all HIGHLY recommend this resort. 5 OUT OF 5. Please pass our thanks onto the people we didn’t see before leaving: housekeeping, restaurant staff, grounds cleaners, pool cleaners; towel keepers. See you next Christmas
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Air conditioning isn't cold. We left the room with all doors closed and set the air conditioning to it's lowest setting (20 degrees celcius) and came back 4 hours later to find it not cooled.The water that is used in the shower has smell of chlorine and people with sensitive skin should be aware of this.The bed is comfortable and the hotel does provide 2 choices of pillows (soft and firm).The location is a little quiet and there isn't much of the local flare and travelling to the central city area is abit far. There is a Bali Tourist Development Centre (BTDC) for food and light shopping.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel. Nice, clean, big and comfortable rooms. Everything there that might be necessary during your stay. Great pool and beach area with lounge and bar. Breakfast buffet huge and with almost everything you can wish. Ice cream would have been great ;)Most important: the staff. Everybody, without exception, has been incredibly kind and competent. We would like to mention JUNI and ONIX in special. Very friendly! Also the ladies at breakfast reception desk greeting us with our names after 2nd day - awesome! But please note, if we could remember the other names of your staff we would mention them well, name by name. Congratulations to this hotel for having such great people doing everything they can and even more for every guest!Thank you very much for this great stay.All the best Christoph and Manuel
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great experience! The staff is kind and nice, always trying to help, always with a smile. The suite for kids is perfect. Amenities include Spa, gym, kids club, pool, bar, resto. The beach is not the best, but everything else compensate.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have arrived the hotel on 3rd December 18 for official training and it is a very hot day outside,but when we come inside the hotel it's really we forget the hot temperature since they warmly welcome us and give us a cold towels. Hotel is nicely located near the beach and staff always ready to help you with smiley faces. We have had every day breakfast and it contains few local foods,few Asian foods and plenty of Western foods.Each and every day restaurant staff warmly welcome us and asked what we want specially such as coffee,type of eggs & any local food. Once we have put our favourites as Indian and local Bali foods & next day they gave us nice Indian breakfast.We have really amazed since we doesn't expect that much from hotel. Plenty of water sports over the beach that next to hotel and it's 13 kilometres away from the airport.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located in the quieter area of Bali (Tanjung Benoa) and has a number of great facilities like Kids play areads, kids club, swimming pool, restaurants, poolside bar, beach bar. and direct access to the beachThe beach itself is not great, but still a nice and secluded one.This hotel makes extra efforts to make families with kids feel very welcome. They go out o fthe way to keep kids entertained, and to entice families to eat in their in-house restaurants, they offer a kids eat free plan - wherein if you order a starter and main course from main menu, one chilld gets a free meal of starter+ main course+ dessert from the kids menuThe thing that really stands out is the service and hospitality. Everyone seems to really enjoy their job and working here and nothing they say or do looks artificial. A great place to stay and feel pampered!
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is our 6th trip to Bali and we have stayed in a lot of hotels. Quite simply, this is the best we have stayed in.The service and friendliness of the staff, from the cleaners to the desk staff, is outstanding.The pool area winds beautifully through the hotel and is surrounded by tropical plants and thatched roof buildings.Our room (king bed) was very modern, clean and comfortable. Breakfast provided an excellent selection and the staff (Special mention to Dika) made us feel very special each morning.The beach, whilst not necessarily the best in Bali, provided all watersport opportunities.There were plenty of good restaurants and massage spas nearby.Children are also very well catered for with a great kids pool and other facilities.Go to the Holiday Inn Bali Benoa - you will not be disappointed.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this property for 9 nights. Over all, our stay was great. The staff is very caring, kind and all of our requests were promptly taken care of. The property has 4 swimming pools and they are great. They have lots of islands and 2 whirlpool areas. The resort is not that big so there is always space in the pool and beach beds are always available.We have a 17 month old with us and he enjoyed running around. I wish the resort was bigger for him.The negative : Theme dinners around the holidays. We went to the Balinese night and it was a huge let down. It was quite expensive for Bali standards (600k rupiah) for 2. The food selection was very limited. They had 6 dishes, 2 veggie dishes, a soup and a small selection of sweets. The suckling pig was the star, Balinese specialty. It was OK but for the price I expected more.The breakfast, however, is good. The food selection is decent. The rooms were really nice. Clean, nice size balcony, good view. Good selection of foreign TV channels. Overall, good little family resort. However, if you care about food, I recommend Novotel up the road. We stayed there before and while Holiday Inn is nicer and more private, Novotel's food blows Holiday Inn out of the water. Their Balinese night had over 20 dishes, deserts, live band and a performance. So, stay away from Theme nights and you will enjoy your stay.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great stay this week at the Holiday Inn Resort. The breakfast was amazing, lots of variety and choices. The staff remembered after the first morning that we preferred ice coffee and brought I every morning. The kids club was great too, our daughter loved it!
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is rather old, but still very popular, due to the direct access to the beach and the very large gardens they have. The swimming pools are facing the sea also. The have gazebos and a spa. The staffs are very helpful. The room prices are rather high, but taking in account of all those mentioned, it's worthed.YoursJames
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would love to come back to stay at this hotel again. The hospitality was great and personal. Staff called to the room to check and ask about what can they do to improve our stay as well. Everything was really good. The only thing I was irritated about was that there were kids in the ground floor shouting and playing in the pool. I could hear it at the top level. Ongoing non stop. Maybe the hotel should control the noise level. But other than that, I have nothing to pick on.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment we step on this resort to we leave, it was all flawless. The resort has a good vibe, makes us feel relax. Every staff we bump onto would greet and smile to us.We even receive a surprise cake in our mini fridge and a flower petals and towel swans on our bed for our anniversary. We have an autistic son with us, and none of your staffs gave us any stares and annoyed look towards us. We felt so welcome during our stay here.We love the fact every hour there are activities for both adults and kids. The spa even has 2-3 days massage accomodating to our stay. Too bad we stayed for a day, we sure to return back soon longer stay for sure. I would like to suggest that it would nice to have halal options in the menu.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you are booking the resort because it's on beach front, then do not book this, the beach next to it is too dirty and plus you there was too low tide, so you cannot enjoy the beach at all. So if you are looking for a beach front property avoid benoa area and book in South Nusa dua.Pros:- The resort has a nice pool and kids play area. - rooms are very spacious and clean- staff very courteous- lot of options in breakfast, but for vegetarian people not so much.Cons- resort is very small compared to what it looks on the images- the water slide that is advertised is very small one and can only be accessed by childrens. - very dirty beach- location is ok, mostly consist of hotels, no nightlife and markets here.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel for a weeks holiday after a hectic cruise around Malaysia. My husband is an elite member so we enjoyed all the benefits this offers, room upgrade. Late check out etc. Staff were so welcoming and polite, great breakfasts/selection, happy hour sundowners on the beach. A birthday cake was given as I celebrated here too. We ate in a couple of nights, delish seafood bbq and Italian buffet. All very good. Room service brought us fresh milk in a jug each morning to make a coffee and a bucket of ice each evening for our G + T's. The pools we're lovely and spotless, water aerobics was a laugh. Little shops nearby to have a nosey and bikes to hire and ride along the promenade at the rear of the hotel. Only disappointment was despite agreeing a late check out our room key function wasn't extended so we were slightly rushed leaving, plus the taxi we pre booked via reception had been forgotten too. But we still made it to the airport on time. Thanks to all the staff and management to a lovely visit to Bali. Highly recommended
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We visited Holiday Inn Bali over the weekend with my family for my husband's birthday and we had such an amazing time there. The staff where very friendly and helpful. The hotel was very neat and clean and gave us a very relaxed feeling. They even had a Kids Club which to me was the best thing in the hotel. It was huge and there's so many things to kids can do in there. Furthermore there are staff to look after the kids if you have to go out. We got a family room and it was so comfy, clean and nice. I will definitely stay here again. Thank you for making our stay amazing.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had an amazing 3 day stay here and so pleased. Its such great value for money. The pools are perfect and the staff are just so attentive and friendly. If youare visiting nusa dua this is the place to stay. All services all are extraordinary! Defntly will back again.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 4 nights stay with my husband at Ocean View room #332 (with big tree exactly blocking our balcony). Room is spacious, comfortable big bed, soft and firm pillows, nice and ethnic furniture. Bathroom is so so, not so big, but complete amenities. Towel's stitches detached, seemed old and looks grayish, to be honest for 5 stars hotels the towels need more thick and keep like new. TV movie delayed between the audio and graphic (probably need to reset sometimes to prevent this issue). order steam rice with additional plate, and 2 pairs spoons and forks, the guy came only with rice on the small bowl, a small plate, 1 pair spoon and fork. I told him "I asked 2 plates, 2 spoons and forks" he replied "Oh need another one, I will be back soon". during our stay, there was project like renovation or anything on the next pool, which was a bit annoying the knocking sound in the morning. Well, not really big issue, however our stay was nice, lovely, comfortable, enjoyed (especially chill at the pool) and bought buy1get1 classic lemonade really gooood.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have a very warm welcome from Onix the guest relation and nice assist from Juni.Check out process also so efficient what an awesome front office?Restaurant for breakfast is very nice, lots of variations, but it needs more attention on serving a glassware.I found chipped glass when I took a fresh juice inside the juice box.Very attentive response from the waiter Alit, he makes us very easy for ordering egg. Some kids jumped when my kid next to them, and I said no jump please, but they keep doing it. Everything was fantastic in the pool.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff is too supportive. But you need to book in pretty advance as room are not available in short notice. The pool is not clean to use. But the morning breakfast and food is too rocking. The hotel has a private beach which people will enjoy and number of active can be done at a cheaper rates.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hospitality from the personal at this hotel is on the top. You really feel welcome and taken care of. I was unfortunate to have stomach problems (not because of the hotel or Bali). The personal was really helpful from contacting a doctor, to take me to a hospital and calls to the room if they could give me any extra service! This really helped me to recover. Thank you!!!Rooms, restaurant, pool and everything was also at the best!
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really enjoyed our recent stay in Benoa Holiday Inn. Like all other Holiday Inns, the hotel is designed around families- kids area, kid friendly pool etc. The best part of the hotel is the Holiday Inn opening to a clean beach on the back. We particularly enjoyed the food & ambience of Nudi beach bar.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are stay for wedding anniversary come with familly, from reception staff owsome and so friendly "christian" he so proffesional and welldone doing his job, and escort us to room so helpfull and verry politely, when entrace the room so surprise with cake and make up bed decoration, our family also so happy enjoy the huge pool,All family verry happy..Thank you Holiday Ini Resort benoa for owsome and wonderfull stay.Verry recomended hotel for family....owsome
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One of the best places to stay if you are traveling with your Kids.The staff goes overboard to take care of the Kids. The check-in process was smooth and the room are spacious.The breakfast spread is just wow. Special Menu for Kids which is prepared without any artificial flavours and preservatives and ITS FREE.Kids club has a wide range of activities throughout the day. My son loved the Firefighter dress which is wore.The parents can leave their kids and go out.The hotel provides phones with local connection through which you can check on them.Food is cheap and tasty. We are very happy with our choice for the hotel.
hotelName:
22    Holiday Inn Resort Bali Benoa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: stayed at Candi beach resort for one night with my partner inside an ocean view suite. The hotel isnt situated in a busy part of the island and there really isnt much to do outside of the resort, but at the hotel there is more than enough to pick from. The room we stayed in was stunning and would highly recommend. The hotel has three swimming pools two of which are infinity pools that give off some of the most amazing views. The food at Candi is also very lovely. whilst staying here me and my partner enjoyed a couples massage together which was perfect and received the best treatment. Our stay at Candi was so relaxing and perfect its very different to most parts of Bali, it is so quiet and peaceful the only thing we wished was that we had stayed longer and when we do return to bali we will certainly be staying back at this resort.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This property is stunning. It is lovely beyond lovely. The grounds are meticulously kept, the rooms are gorgeous, and the restaurants and their staff are delightful. However, there is SUCH a lack of WARMTH from the front desk staff and the administrative folks that it is shocking, especially considering the warmth of the Balinese people and my experiences in other hotels in Bali. I travel to Bali annually and stay all around the island for 4 weeks at a time. I stay in about 6 or 7 hotels over that time so have a good sample of hospitality on the island. This is my first stay at Candi Beach Resort and I am not sure yet if I will return. The Villa was lovely, but some details were missed - the curtains were not installed around our outdoor day bed though most other villas had them, the private pool was not cleaned daily (gosh that sounds bratty - but we did pay for it, you know). Then again there were lovely details included like afternoon tea brought to the villa, laundry delivered in a sustainable box and not plastic, and a terrific sustainability/eco program. We stayed in a Villa, the highest accommodation level. I had some email questions before arriving about booking the spa and some other services and the staff failed to get back to me - I had to follow up multiple times. Then they got a bit defensive in their tone. I asked about whether I should reserve the spa in advance of our trip or if we could get in right away when we checked in. All they did was send me the spa menu. Of course when we checked in, there was very little available and we could not book the spa experience we wanted. We witnessed at least three other couples with the same issue, trying to book and being told nothing was available during their stay (And they replied in a disappointed tone that management told them it would be no problem to reserve when they arrived), so it was not just our bad luck. Seems to me the hotel could do better in creating a process. We had a number of other issues with some checkout requests and an adjustment to one of our activities and while the front desk eventually sorted it out, it took at least 3 phone calls or stops at the front desk each time we had a query, being put on hold, being transferred to multiple people etc - for very simple and basic requests. The language was not a barrier and I also speak quite a bit of the local language myself. If this hotel would like to charge the high end prices that they do (they certainly have high end decor and property) they should work on training their management staff to behave accordingly. The property employees, however, are SO warm and kind - from servers to housekeeping to cooks every person is a delightful and kind human. We took the cooking class by the sea and had the absolute BEST time and highly recommend that. Absolutely. The staff and chef were wonderful and we loved it! THEY are the reason (along with the stunning property) that I give it such a high rating. If it was on management alone I would never stay here again EVER.Visitors should also know that this IS Bali - there will be an occasional lizard or bug in your room. The indoors is the outdoors in many ways - even in the high end villas. We had quite a few cicak lizards and such, but that is the way. There WAS a monkey and her baby on our patio who hissed whenever we went out there for a while. We let the staff know and the woman at the front desk, in a bored tone, blandly asked "well is it still there now?" (as if I was going to go out and check on the angry monkey at that moment when it had just lunged at me). I did not want them to do anything - and told them so - but wanted THEIR staff to know so they did not get an angry mama monkey lunging at them. Oh well. I absolutely hated interacting with their front desk completely. So bland and indifferent and quite rude, really. We want to return with our kids next year (this one was kid free), but are still undecided. Love the property, don't love the management. GO for the property, but know that if you need assistance it will be an irritating hassle - or at least you will be made to FEEL that you are irritating.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Candi Beach Resort for the 2nd time at the start of our Bali holiday. What a great resort and right on the sea. The deluxe suites are 5 star and have the best features. The spa bath on the balcony is a great way to relax and enjoy the sea view with a wine or two.The 3 three restaurants all have varied menus and the food quality is very good. Also the breakfast is top class and plentiful.The staff are excellent and just want to make sure that you enjoy your holiday to the max.We will return.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent only 2 nights here before we went off to Nusas Penida. It our relax and acclimatisation stay after a long trip. The Candi Beach Resort is really perfect for relaxed holidays. There is not much around the hotel, so it might be ill suited for travellers who look for Kuta-style activities and vibrations. The resort offers everything for a calm and relaxed holiday. Its close to the beach and has several pools. The 3 restaurants offer enough choice for different preferences. The staff is friendly and makes your stay a very relaxing experience. On our first evening we had the romatic dinner on the rooftop. Just great. Awesoem food and very nice decoration, although the strong winds were a big challenge for the organization. If you are lucky and the weather is not hazy you can even grab a good view of Mount Agung.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed in one of their villas for 3 nights. The villa was really nice and looks just like the photos. Note, you will get bugs in your room but that's par for the course in Bali. The resort grounds are well maintained and the rooms were tidy. We also did a couples massage, which was nice and fairly inexpensive (I think $100 US for the two of us). My biggest complaint is the area itself and their restaurants. There isn't really a beach you can walk on, especially if the tide is high, which it was pretty much the entire time. Moreover, the ocean and beach is polluted so you can't get into the water without stepping on or swimming among the trash. Know that the resort is a bit of a compound and the nearby town doesn't offer much.That said, we ate most of our meals at one of the 3 resort's restaurants. Food was fine, nothing special or worthy of note; however, both my husband and I got sick (and on two different days). Note that when you get sick in Bali, it also lasts for 3-5 days and it's not fun. I think it was the prawns but it's hard to say for sure. We told the front desk but they didn't care one bit. Not impressed, especially for a "luxury" resort. Nor am I confident that they will do anything about it. We also had to wait until actual check in time for our room, which was a little irritating since they didn't take our bags, just left them sitting on a bench in the lobby, so we opted to stay with them and wait. It was more baffling since the resort wasn't full either. Overall service was good and everyone was polite, just wasn't impressed with the front desk staff. Bottom line, it's like a faux luxury resort. They charge the price of a luxury resort but had a few missteps compared to normal westernized resorts. It's fine but we stayed at much better places for less or about the same price elsewhere on the island and on the neighboring islands (the latter of which is a MUST). We actually regretted staying for more than 2 nights, which would have been plenty to have the experience of a villa near to the beach.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband & I have just returned from 2 weeks in a luxury pool villa, the best way to describe our holiday is FANTASTIC. From the first day to the last it was just superb, all the staff from gardening & maintenance to management could not have been friendlier. The luxury pool villa is just that..... LUXURY, having our own pool was brilliant. It was so quiet & relaxing, our villa was so private. It was my husbands birthday whilst we were away the restaurant staff presented him with a birthday cake very nice touch. The food in the restaurants is such a high quality & all the restaurant staff were so friendly & obliging. We have travelled to many places & have never had a more substantial all inclusive package (normally certain restaurants are extra & in room mini bars are extra) not at Candi Beach. The provision of proper flip flops for round the pool & slippers & gown for inside the villa was such a nice touch. Another lovely surprise was that around 15:30 daily the doorbell would ring & afternoon tea, coffee, cakes & fruit were brought daily........brilliant. We will definitely be visiting again.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed this resort for 4 nights and were impressed with the cleanliness of the hotel surroundings. The gardens are very well maintained and staff work tirelessly all the time. The staff were always welcoming and never ignored you when you walked passed them, its a good feeling. Only one disappointment, and that was when I received a text message at the airport that the taxi driver arranged by the hotel couldn't pick us up & we were asked make our own way there in the last minute. But all in all it was a wonderful experience
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had the Ocean suite. The room was very large and well appointed. Had a spacious balcony with a 2person tub, large couch, coffee table, chairs, ceiling fan and controls on the side of the couch to work the fan and dim the lights.The room also had a couch and coffee table at the foot of the bed (the comfortable bed)... We enjoyed the kimonos and flip flops they provide in the room (and umbrella which we didn't need).Nice pool area, pool was relaxing. Hot tub didn't get hot, same temp as the pool.Staff and food were great at the restaurants! Breakfast buffet was stellar. When i asked about dragonfruit, it appeared 10 minutes later (cut and skinned) :)Truly a great place, would definitely stay again!
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you want a place to relax this it ! It’s worth upgrading to suite , rooms are amazing , breakfast is great , staff are very friendly and attentive. The resort offers a lot of space and privacy from dining areas to pool and beach areas !
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The ocean view from my balcony sofa where i'm writing this lengthy review, is simply fantastic!. One can simply doze off listening to the sound of the waves crushes the shores. We were riding from the city the day before, initially made a stop here only for a drink, and then everything in this hotel felt sooo right that we decided to stay. This is a new suite, the layout, the bed, the color scheme, feels fresh, airy and bright, with such an expensive ocean view from the balcony. The suites have private parking area and more personalized reception. The suite itself is equipped with all essentials that we need for an unplanned stay. More than enough amenities, we love that they all packaged in paper wrap instead of plastic packaging, nicely arranged in a flat rattan basket. I smiled when i found among them are two small rubber band for hair. Oh how thoughtful!. Unlike other hotel, there provide 2 pairs of proper flip flops alongside the usual sleepers, also 2 complimentary beach sarong. After having drink at BIRU and delicious pizza at BASIL in the afternoon, our dinner at OCEAN TERRACE was equally enjoyable. The tuna was cooked exactly the way we wanted, and the cardamon chicken was tender and has subtle taste, not overpowering. The buffet breakfast at the same spot this morning was easy. They may not have extensive breakfast buffet items, but we were satisfied because each food that we had was all tasty.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My partner and I just spent 4 nights in a luxury pool villa. This was by far the most amazing, luxurious (and private) villa we have stayed in. The private pool and cabana is simply sensational. The room is extremely generous in size with a very comfortable super king bed and a large day bed. The huge separate bathroom has a spa and a covered outdoor double shower. The staff at the hotel were the friendliest, most attentive hotel staff I have experienced. Nothing was too much trouble. The grounds of the hotel are lush and very well maintained. Breakfast, which is a la carte for villa guests, was lovely and the pool snacks which were delivered to the villa were delicious; however the evening meals at the restaurant were just okay. We were a little tentative about travelling to Candidasa, having always stayed in Seminyak and while there is very little to see or do in the town, it wasn’t a problem as the villa was so fabulous we didn’t want to leave it. We will definitely return as soon as possible. It is truly paradise.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The resort is nice enough great location for snorkel in and diving but...I got sick from either a salad or a cocktailResort staff didn’t care and the toilet blocked...A really unpleasant experience for a 5 star resort
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Candi Beach Resort was absolutely stunning!! We stayed in the Luxury Ocean View Suite and one of the most amazing aspects was the location of this hotel being right on the beach. The view from our private balcony was absolutely incredible (photos attached). We were often able to watch the sun rise and set right from our own balcony which was one of our favorite things to do! The beautiful location and views are what made us want to book this resort, however, everything about it ended up being perfect. The staff are all incredibly kind, the food and drinks at the 2 restaurants are great, and they also have a great tour booking crew right in their lobby which was a huge plus for us. Right through the hotel, we booked a bunch of tours including hiking Mount Batur and a Day in Nusa Penida. Each tour we went on, we were accompanied by an amazing and informative guide! Although this resort may have been a bit further away from some popular cities and sites than other resorts (we actually wanted a more secluded resort!), it was still just a car ride away from everything! Overall, I loved everything about this resort and our vacation here, and would definitely love to return one day!
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was impressed with every corner of the resorts, cleanliness, spacious villa comfortable for a family with 2 kids, private pool and relaxing gazebo. Huge dressing area and separate shower, bathtub with Jacuzzi. The hotel greenery with a beautiful lawn garden we enjoyed the most. Swimming pool with breathtaking ocean view is a favorite spot for an InstagrammersI was also very impressive by all staff within the hotel, even when I asked if they could provide a special meal that not available on the menu they able to arrange everything. Komang the bellboy, genuinely friendly and explains my small niece and nephew everything they have seen on the way to our villa.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our choice in Bali for our honeymoon. Highly recommend this resort. Stayed in the luxury ocean view suite and didn’t want to leave. Staff are all excellent. Amenities great. Food was awesome. Super chilled atmosphere in a quieter part of Bali.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a wonderful stay at this resort. If you’re after the hustle & bustle of Bali Candidasa isn’t the place for you. If you want to relax this place is it. Top staff great food from two restaurants one western one indo, would give the top restaurants in Seminyak a run for their money, so much space in the hotel grounds with views of the mountain ranges on one side and Ocean on the other.Our only negative was we didn’t stay long enough,
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have travelled various 5star hotels around the world. I would rate well the suite option with the sea view and private jacuzzi and bed on the terrace. The breakfast was of good quality. The information that guests from villas and suites can order can proper coffee for breakfast could be emphasised more by the reception. We found out on the second day luckily as the normal coffee wasnt good. I would welcome to have red watermelon every breakfast. Generally speaking, the beach was very nice, it could be cleaned more often by the staff when needed. The garden and rooms are kept tidy. And there are good cheap restaurants and small shops within walking distance. I would recommend this place as a relaxing sea holiday.And I would also suggest to sell crisps (crackers) by the pool. We would have welcomed it as a snack. When we asked the staff they gave us some for free from the restaurant which was very sweet of them.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all, WONDERFUL stay!Stayed in Deluxe Pool Villa for 2 nights with my wife and 8-months-baby. Room was clean and spacious. There are big jacuzzi bathtub, giant LCD TV, sofa bed, wide pool, etc. I found the room very exotic for couples, recommended for honeymooners. Outside the room, there are 2 public pools with jacuzzi (1 infinity pool facing straight to the ocean). In the lobby, there’s fish pond which you can feed the fishes. I would come back here again when visiting Candidasa/Karangasem Bali.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for 2 nights before I headed back home after a couple weeks in Asia and Bali. I picked this places based off of the glowing reviews and decided to treat myself to a suite room facing the ocean. The room happened to be right above the hotel bar which plays music every night and has people sit outside all day. The balcony doors are very thin glass so it was very loud. The staff was very accommodating, showing me various rooms and even offing me a private villa to stay in for the same price. I opted for a lower room so I could still have an ocean view. I was also a little disappointed with the food. I ordered the Wagyu steak and it was tough stringy and looked almost like a meatloaf. It was very strange so I questioned the staff about it and the brought me the fillet which looked like a strip steak with the color of pork. Other than that the beach/pool were nice and staff was friendly and tried to be accommodating. I think a little better attention to detail could go a long way.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful, relaxing ambiance - swimming in the infinity pool by the beach, fine dining. We really enjoyed our stay at this very pleasant resort. We had two excellent tours by the hotel guide, KOMAN. He was extremely informative and shared a lot of information about the Balinese culture and tradition. His English was excellent.We ate at both the Balinese and the western restaurants at the hotel. Our waitress, ERA, at the Balinese restaurant (Ocean Terrace) was especially friendly, professional and helpful. She had a wonderful smile and we enjoyed chatting with her.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All we can say about the Candi Beach Resort and Spa is perfection! Right from the moment we stepped in the service and staff were impeccable. The location is absolutely amazing, the beach safe and clean. The two pools immaculate and refreshing. The gardens were manicured and perfect for children to have lots of space to safely run free.The breakfast was amazing, you couldn't fault anything, the staff so friendly and attentive. I would like to commend Ayu such perfect host and so gracious. Dandi the waiter was so very nice and went out of his way for us.The General Manager Gede was beyond accommodating, and couldn't have been more helpful, such a credit to his profession. The whole experience there was so wonderful we are definitely returning soon.Candidasa is a hidden secret and paradise.Thankyou to all, Adele and Steve Cooley
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place is next level! The service, the villas, the food, the setting is nicer than any villa or resort we have ever stayed in. We payed a bit more but it so worth it. 35 years we’ve been coming to Bali and we just found a wonderful reason to return. Stayed in 4 different places this time but we should have just stayed here. We had plans for Candidasa but we did not leave the resort the entire time we stayed. Why would ya? Beautiful walks and views, fun activities, sensational food and service, clean manicured gardens, afternoon tea in our villa by the pool, turn down service including last minute mosquito control. It didn’t matter who you dealt with or what you needed the staff were exceptional. I even had the most wonderful fire fly experience walking through the gardens early one morning. It was surreal. These people are setting a new standard for Bali. We will be returning and can’t wait for our next visit. Thank you so much to all of the staff. Made our holiday so special and we will be back.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The ocean terrace has the best food in Bali, the steak is the best part, very juicy and tasty. And this restaurant has a tremendous ocean view, it’s in front of the beach. I would like to come to this restaurant again if I come to Bali.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This resort is a perfect getaway for families and couples alike. located at the pristine beach and close to blue lagoon , this hotel offers great views and good food and wonderful hospitality. would love to stay here in our next bali trip.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This property was beautiful and romantic. It was really well maintained and clean. This is a resort where you can spend all of your time in even if you don’t have plans of sightseeing. There are two pools, a spa for which i suggest you book in advance, snorkelling and scuba diving facilities. The restaurant also serves delicious food and their breakfast buffet spread is really good. The hotel also arranges for sightseeing.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Sometimes you want to indulge yourself and don't look at the price-tag. This hotel is a perfect choice if you are in that mood. Spacious rooms, lots of facilities, polite service, a bunch of amenities. Well, it's not cheap, should you afford, stay there a couple of nights.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Candi Beach Resort is worth a visit for “more often” Bali travelers since there is not much of Bali to get to know around the hotel.Beautiful hotel and view. A little far from Bali Airport (2:30h by car) and perfect for relaxing at the hotel pool and beach the whole day.Definitely would go for an ocean view room. My compliments to all hotel staff - everyone is so nice!!
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great family holiday. One of the most comfortable beds I’ve slept in and fab location right on the beach.Gorgeous new restaurant and one of best spas in Bali.Interconnected rooms not a problem for families and extra bed on request.Amazing helpful and accommodating staff.One of best resorts in Bali and great value.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Awestruck by the beauty of the resort area. Nice private beach. Good opportunities for booking local trips, snorkling etc. Very friendly staff and good service. The food was great too. Would like to go back and stay longer next time.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: for this holiday we visited 5 different hotels and 3 countries, but this hotel unfortunately came up to be the very worst one. Since entering the room for the 1st time I have noticed cracks on the walls, stains on the bed curtains, window curtains and overall was disappointed after spending my first 30 minutes of presence in this hotel. When I have entered the washroom and could notice that it is not being properly washed either. The worst thing is that now I have a strange pappiloma on my hip that appeared there the next day after I took shower in my room. So the washroom is lacking a lot of proper cleaning and disinfecting. There were some informative booklets on the desk, but they were covered with the little pieces of ceiling coating, and they were falling of every day on anything I put there.The only positive thing is marvellous breakfast that you can have when enjoying a fantastic view!The prices at the diving club and the tour agency opposite to the reception are ridiculous!Was not pleased with the service either, 10000 IDR were taken upon check in, but regardless of that the amount is very small, I was never told about this deposit before coming to the hotel. So this hotel leaves an impression of that it needs renovation and is lacking good management.Very remote location from Ngurah Rai, was charged 450000 IDR for the transfer.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed in 2 - 5 star hotel but never have bad experience like it.Bad experience:1. When we arrived at the hotel by car, hotel staff told me to park my car. After I park my car, another staff come and told me to move my car a little bit to the front. So I came back to my car, and move it. Than when I unload my luggages, no staff came to help me. We brought many luggages because we travel with children and brought our own snorkeling equipments, but no one come to help2. After brought our luggages alone to receptionist, he told us to make another extra payment because we bring our children. They said that hotel's policy requires us to pay. When I said that I never experienced like this and my kids will sleep with me so no need for extra bed, the receptionist and the hotel manager said that we still have to pay because our kids (5 and 9 years old) will consume the hotel water... WHAT? Not trying to ruin our vacation, my wife calm me and we paid for extra charges3. Later I check at the hotel official website candibeachbali, the hotel policies mention that children under 12 are free, as long sleep with their PARENTS. I came back to receptionist and asked explanation about this. After waiting, a manager show up and mention that the hotel's policy already mention in Agoda. I asked why than it's different with hotel official website, she mention that they don't put all the policy there, and they only tolerate if I have one child. If I have two kids, they will charge for one kid.And I said, it's not there in the hotel's policy. Why different?And she said that because I bought from Agoda which is CHEAPER than their official website, so there was DIFFERENT hotel policy. I was very surprise by her answer because that was a very arrogant answer. I was felt look down by her and thought that she just made up that answer. I than replied so it is because different price, and she said yes. The manager seem angry and was trying to void my payment. I said no need to do that because of I can accept that answer. I felt like no use to talk to the hotel because they won't listen. It waste of time. Besides that, I felt like she want to intimidate me and I dont want them to do something nasty to me or my family. I said all I want is vacation here and don't ruin it.I don't want my money back, I just want explanation because I don't like being fooled.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Candi Beach Resort & Spa offers exceptional service. I stayed in one of the Ocean View Suites and it was brilliant. Stunning Ocean views and beautiful room furnishings. Staff is very helpful, welcoming and attentive without being intrusive. The grounds are very well looked after, just a tropical paradise. Loved every minute of my stay. I only can recommend it.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful time by the beach.The villa with a private pool was sooo nice you don't want to leave.Staff were super friendly and helpful including making sure that I found a doctor. American breakfast near the water was excellent. An unforgetable experience that makes me want to come back in the not too distant future.Thank you so much for letting us have this wonderful experience.
hotelName:
23    Candi Beach Resort & Spa
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a late arrival and had a warm welkome with a cocktail and flower lei. We stayed there 9 nights in a seafront bungalow. The accomodation was well equipt and the bed was very good. The staf as well as the service crew did an excellent job! We enjoyed the big breakfast buffet. Most of the time we skipped lunch or enjoyed half portion Soto Adam. The dinner menu has special Bali dishes as well as international once. The presentation of the food is nice and the quality excellent.
